ancestries.name: Human
ancestries.description: Short-lived, fragile, and driven by burning ambition. They possess a grit that allows them to endure when all hope seems lost.

feats.name: Adaptable Learner
feats.effect: Choose one Skill you are not Trained in. You become Trained (d4) in that Skill.

feats.name: Desperate Luck
feats.effect: The first time you would be reduced to 0 HP during a combat, you can spend 1 Luck Point (Free Action) to instead be at 1 HP.

feats.name: Resourceful
feats.effect: Choose one benefit: Gain +4 Max HP, +1 Max Stamina (STA), +2 Max Mana (MP), or +1 Inventory Slot.

feats.name: Silver-Tongued
feats.effect: Advantage on Influence (CHA) Checks made to barter, negotiate prices, or find a buyer for loot.

feats.name: Stubborn Resolve
feats.effect: Advantage on Checks to resist the Frightened condition. The first time you are Frightened in a session, ignore the effects for 1 round.

feats.name: Press the Advantage
feats.effect: When you roll a Natural 20 (Crit) on a Check, you gain BOTH a Bonus Effect AND 1 Luck Point.

ancestries.name: Elf
ancestries.description: Ancient, decadent, and cold. Their long lives make them alien to others. Whether high-minded scholars or subterranean dwellers, they are dangerous.

feats.name: Arcane Resonance
feats.effect: Your Maximum Mana (MP) increases by 2.

feats.name: Keen Senses
feats.effect: You become Trained (d4) in Scrutiny (WIS).

feats.name: Martial Elegance
feats.effect: Gain Proficiency (d4) with Rapiers and Longbows. If already Trained, become Expert (d6).

feats.name: Otherworldly Trance
feats.effect: You do not sleep. You enter a conscious 4-hour trance to gain the benefits of a Long Rest.

feats.name: Unfathomable Mind
feats.effect: Advantage on Checks to resist the Charmed condition or opposed Influence (CHA) checks.

feats.name: Unnatural Grace
feats.effect: Advantage on all Acrobatics (DEX) Checks made to balance, tumble, or escape holds.

ancestries.name: Dwarf
ancestries.description: A folk of stone, gold, and memory. Stubborn and unbreakable, forged by the pressure of the deep earth.

feats.name: Stout Constitution
feats.effect: Advantage on Checks to resist Poisoned. Your Maximum HP increases by 1.

feats.name: Stone-Sense
feats.effect: Become Trained (d4) in Craft & Tinker (INT). Advantage on Scrutiny Checks to spot traps/doors in stone.

feats.name: Dwarven Armor Training
feats.effect: Ignore the Disadvantage on Stealth imposed by wearing Medium Armor.

feats.name: Treasure-Hauler
feats.effect: You gain +2 Inventory Slots.

feats.name: Axe & Hammer Mastery
feats.effect: Gain Proficiency (d4) with Handaxes, Battleaxes, and Warhammers. If already Trained, become Expert (d6).

feats.name: Unbreakable Focus
feats.effect: Advantage on Checks to resist the Confused or Dazed conditions.

ancestries.name: Smallfolk
ancestries.description: Halflings, Gnomes, Pixies. Overlooked, mischievous, and fiercely lucky.

feats.name: Fae-Touched
feats.effect: Advantage on Checks to resist magical spells or the Charmed condition.

feats.name: Halfling's Luck
feats.effect: When you roll a Natural 1 (Whiff), spend 1 Luck Point to re-roll. Must use new result.

feats.name: Inquisitive Mind
feats.effect: Become Trained (d4) in either Craft & Tinker (INT) or Lore & Knowledge (INT).

feats.name: Mischievous
feats.effect: Become Trained (d4) in Deception (CHA).

feats.name: Naturally Stealthy
feats.effect: Become Trained (d4) in Stealth & Thievery (DEX).

feats.name: Nimble Escape
feats.effect: When you pass a Dodge (DEX) Check, immediately move 5 feet (no counter-attacks).

ancestries.name: Goblin
ancestries.description: Small, cunning survivors. Masters of junk-crafting and dirty fighting.

feats.name: Filth-Eater
feats.effect: Advantage on Checks to resist the Poisoned condition.

feats.name: Goblin Cunning
feats.effect: When crafting Alchemist or Poisoner Reagents, the Craft DC is reduced by 2.

feats.name: Junk-Tinker
feats.effect: Use Craft & Tinker (INT) to repair a Fragile weapon that has broken (DC 11, 1 Turn).

feats.name: Backstabber
feats.effect: When you make a melee Attack Check against a Flanked enemy, deal +1 damage.

feats.name: Skulker
feats.effect: Become Trained (d4) in Stealth & Thievery (DEX).

feats.name: Wiry Escape
feats.effect: Advantage on any Check made to escape the Grappled condition.

ancestries.name: Orc
ancestries.description: Forged by conflict, valued for violence. Defined by their strength and their scars.

feats.name: Powerful Build
feats.effect: Become Trained (d4) in Athletics (STR).

feats.name: Brute's Endurance
feats.effect: Max HP +1. Advantage on Checks to resist Exhausted.

feats.name: Brutal Damage
feats.effect: When making a melee attack using STR, re-roll one damage die that results in a 1.

feats.name: Menacing
feats.effect: Become Trained (d4) in Intimidation (CHA).

feats.name: Savage Weapon Training
feats.effect: Gain Proficiency (d4) with Greataxes and Mauls. If Trained, become Expert (d6).

feats.name: Warrior's Blood
feats.effect: Your Maximum Stamina (STA) increases by 1.

ancestries.name: Beastfolk
ancestries.description: Feline, canine, or ursine humanoids. Driven by powerful instincts and primal strength.

feats.name: Natural Weapons
feats.effect: Your Unarmed Strike becomes a Finesse weapon that deals 1d6 damage.

feats.name: Primal Senses
feats.effect: Become Trained (d4) in Scrutiny (WIS). Advantage on Survival Checks to track.

feats.name: Feline Agility
feats.effect: Become Trained (d4) in Acrobatics (DEX). Advantage to reduce fall damage.

feats.name: Ursine Vigor
feats.effect: Max HP +1. Advantage on Checks to resist Weakened.

feats.name: Wilderness Dweller
feats.effect: Become Trained (d4) in Survival (WIS). Advantage on Stealth in natural environments.

feats.name: Agile Climber
feats.effect: Become Trained (d4) in Athletics (STR). Climb surfaces with handholds without checks.

ancestries.name: Avian
ancestries.description: Bird-like folk of high places. Fast, fragile, and possess an alien perspective.

feats.name: Feather-Light
feats.effect: Advantage on Acrobatics (DEX) to balance/tumble. Take Half Damage from falls.

feats.name: Keen Eyesight
feats.effect: Become Trained (d4) in Scrutiny (WIS).

feats.name: Gliding
feats.effect: If you can spread wings: 0 Damage from falls, move 10ft horizontal for every 10ft descent.

feats.name: Talons
feats.effect: Unarmed Strike deals 1d4 damage and has Finesse and Precise properties.

feats.name: Quickness
feats.effect: Your Base Speed is 35 feet.

feats.name: Omen-Touched
feats.effect: Become Trained (d4) in Deception (CHA).

ancestries.name: Draconid
ancestries.description: People of scale and spite. Innately magical and driven by deep-seated ancestral greed.

feats.name: Elemental Resistance
feats.effect: Choose Fire or Poison. You have Advantage on Checks to resist the Burning or Poisoned condition (matching your choice).

feats.name: Scaly Hide
feats.effect: While Unarmored, you have natural Armor Score (AS) 1. Stacks with Shield.

feats.name: Trap-Maker's Cunning
feats.effect: Become Trained (d4) in Craft & Tinker (INT). Advantage to disarm traps.

feats.name: Draconic Presence
feats.effect: Become Trained (d4) in Intimidation (CHA).

feats.name: Gold-Sense
feats.effect: Advantage on Scrutiny or Investigate checks to find hidden treasure or appraise.

feats.name: Latent Magic
feats.effect: Your Maximum Mana (MP) increases by 2.

ancestries.name: Plantfolk
ancestries.description: Fungus-folk, dryads, or animated wood. Slow to anger but deep in resolve.

feats.name: Barkskin
feats.effect: Max HP +1. Advantage on Checks to resist Weakened.

feats.name: Patient Endurance
feats.effect: Advantage on Checks to resist being knocked Prone or moved against your will.

feats.name: Herbalist's Knack
feats.effect: Become Trained (d4) in Craft & Tinker (INT). Herbalism Craft DC reduced by 2.

feats.name: Blinding Spores
feats.effect: Action: 5ft radius cloud. Creatures must pass CON Check (DC 11) or be Blinded 1 round. Recharges on Long Rest.

feats.name: Photosynthesis
feats.effect: No Rations needed. Advantage on Survival checks in forests/jungles.

feats.name: Alien Mind
feats.effect: Advantage on Checks to resist Charmed or Confused.

backgrounds.name: Acolyte
backgrounds.description: Spent life in service to a god or cult. Knows ancient rites and sacrificial incense.

feat.name: Divine Sanctuary
feat.effect: You can find safe haven at temples/shrines of your faith. You are considered a guest and can rest safely.

backgrounds.name: Forbidden Scholar
backgrounds.description: Studied heretical texts locked in deep vaults. Your education is dangerous.

feat.name: Whispers of the Void
feat.effect: When encountering 'forbidden' lore, ask the GM for one piece of obscure/dangerous info about it.

backgrounds.name: Antiquarian
backgrounds.description: A seeker of the past who sees the value hidden within history.

feat.name: Eye for Value
feat.effect: Advantage to appraise items. Can sell gems/art/relics for 10% more gold in a safe haven.

backgrounds.name: Field Medic
backgrounds.description: A battlefield sawbones. You know the smell of gangrene and the sound of a dying breath.

feat.name: Triage
feat.effect: Action: Assess a creature/corpse to get a summary of their physical state (Stable, Bleeding out, Poisoned, etc.).

backgrounds.name: Alchemist's Apprentice
backgrounds.description: Spent years cleaning beakers and inhaling fumes. Knows how to turn filth into fire.

feat.name: Alchemical Eye
feat.effect: Advantage on Checks to identify potions, poisons, or unknown substances.

backgrounds.name: Artisan
backgrounds.description: A maker of things. Smiths, tinkers, masons. You know everything has a breaking point.

feat.name: Eye for Craft
feat.effect: When examining a crafted object, ask the GM for one piece of info (weak point, origin, value).

backgrounds.name: Herbalist
backgrounds.description: A wild-crafter who knows which roots stop bleeding and which mushrooms stop a heart.

feat.name: Forager's Lore
feat.effect: Ask the GM one practical fact about a plant/fungus (Edible? Poisonous? Medicinal?).

backgrounds.name: Poisoner
backgrounds.description: Deals in death with a single drop. Understands the crawling and burning tricks of nature.

feat.name: Poisoner's Eye
feat.effect: Advantage on Checks to identify a poison, its effects, or its delivery method.

backgrounds.name: Urchin
backgrounds.description: Raised by the streets. A gutter rat who knows how to be invisible.

feat.name: Hidden Paths
feat.effect: Advantage to navigate cities/sewers. Can find safe places to rest in urban environments.

backgrounds.name: Cat Burglar
backgrounds.description: A second-story artist. Sees walls and locks as puzzles to be solved.

feat.name: Case the Joint
feat.effect: Spend 10 mins observing a location to ask the GM for one detail about security (patrols, blind spots).

backgrounds.name: Smuggler
backgrounds.description: Moves things that shouldn't be moved. Knows the back roads and the right bribes.

feat.name: Hidden Compartment
feat.effect: Gain 1 'Hidden' Inventory Slot. Items here are undetectable without a specific search (Scrutiny DC 13).

backgrounds.name: Gambler
backgrounds.description: Lives by the roll of a die. Expert at reading tells and calculating odds.

feat.name: Read the Tell
feat.effect: After 1 min of conversation, ask the GM one question about a creature's emotional state/intentions.

backgrounds.name: Sellsword
backgrounds.description: A hired blade. Not a hero, but a professional who knows loyalty belongs to the highest bidder.

feat.name: Mercenary's Reputation
feat.effect: Advantage on Influence Checks to secure jobs, contracts, or find underworld hubs.

backgrounds.name: Gladiator
backgrounds.description: Survivor of the pits. A practical fighter who knows how to size up an opponent.

feat.name: Sizing Up
feat.effect: Action: Make Scrutiny (DC 11) vs creature. Success: GM tells you one physical strength or weakness.

backgrounds.name: City Watch
backgrounds.description: A former copper. Has a cynical eye for trouble and knows how to make people talk.

feat.name: Voice of Authority
feat.effect: Advantage on Intimidation Checks against common criminals and low-level society members.

backgrounds.name: Deserter
backgrounds.description: Ran from the war. Learned to survive off the land and spot bounty hunters.

feat.name: Lie Low
feat.effect: Advantage on Survival Checks to find hidden, defensible campsites.

backgrounds.name: Courtier
backgrounds.description: Creature of the court. Thrives in a jungle of silks, whispers, and poison.

feat.name: Courtly Graces
feat.effect: Advantage on Influence Checks in formal settings (courts, galas, meetings).

backgrounds.name: Exiled Noble
backgrounds.description: Born to privilege, lost it all. Carries the weight of a name and education.

feat.name: Noble Bearing
feat.effect: Advantage on Influence Checks with nobility/officials (if exile status is unknown/irrelevant).

backgrounds.name: Charlatan
backgrounds.description: Con artist and fake miracle-worker. Faith is a tool, and you wield it well.

feat.name: False Identity
feat.effect: Advantage on Deception Checks to convince others of your practiced alias.

backgrounds.name: Escaped Cultist
backgrounds.description: Saw behind the curtain and fled. Knows the signs of the dark orders hunting you.

feat.name: Dark Whispers
feat.effect: Advantage to recognize cult symbols, identify members, or recall rites.

archetypes.name: The Soldier
archetypes.description: The disciplined core of any party. A tactical lynchpin who wins through superior technique, armor mastery, and battlefield command.

talents.name: Precise Strike
talents.effect: Trigger: When you hit with a weapon attack. Effect: Add your Proficiency Die to the damage roll. Empower (1 STA): You can declare this before rolling to add the Proficiency Die to the Attack Check instead.
talents.details: Useful for bypassing high Defense enemies.

talents.name: Penetrating Strike
talents.effect: Trigger: When you make a weapon attack. Effect: The attack ignores 2 points of the target's Armor Score (AS). Empower (1 STA): The attack ignores ALL of the target's Armor Score.
talents.details: Essential against heavily armored foes like Golems or Knights.

talents.name: Riposte
talents.effect: Trigger: When you successfully Parry a melee attack. Effect: You may immediately make a single melee Attack Check against the attacker.
talents.details: Turns defense into offense. Requires a Melee Weapon.

talents.name: Cleave
talents.effect: Trigger: When you hit a creature with a melee attack. Effect: A different enemy adjacent to the original target takes damage equal to your STR Modifier. Empower (1 STA): Make a full Attack Check against the adjacent enemy instead.
talents.details: Great for clearing Minions.

talents.name: Distracting Strike
talents.effect: Trigger: When you hit a creature. Effect: The next ally to attack that creature (before the start of your next turn) has Advantage on their Attack Check.
talents.details: Set up your Rogue or Brute for a massive hit.

talents.name: Feint
talents.effect: Action: Make a Check (INT + Proficiency) against the target's Will Save Value. Effect: On a success, your next Attack Check against that target has Advantage.
talents.details: Uses tactical knowledge to create an opening.

talents.name: Grit
talents.effect: Trigger: When you take damage. Effect: Reduce the damage taken by 1d8 + CON Modifier.
talents.details: Can reduce damage to 0. Does not require a shield.

talents.name: Discipline
talents.effect: Trigger: When you fail a check to resist Fear, Charm, or Confusion. Effect: Re-roll the check. You must use the new result.
talents.details: Mental fortitude is a soldier's shield.

talents.name: Interceptor
talents.effect: Trigger: An ally within 5 feet is targeted by an attack. Effect: You switch places with the ally (if willing) and the attack targets you instead.
talents.details: You perform your Defense Check against the attack normally.

talents.name: Second Wind
talents.effect: Action: You center yourself and regain 1d10 + Level Hit Points. This can only be used once per combat encounter.
talents.details: Does not provoke counter-attacks.

talents.name: Phalanx
talents.effect: Action: You lock your shield. Until the start of your next turn, you gain a +2 Bonus to Block Checks and you cannot be knocked Prone.
talents.details: Requires a Shield equipped.

talents.name: Hold the Line
talents.effect: Action: You enter a defensive stance. Until the start of your next turn, any enemy moving out of a space adjacent to you provokes an immediate Opportunity Attack from you. If this attack hits, the enemy's Speed becomes 0 for the rest of the turn.
talents.details: Locks enemies in melee with you.

talents.name: Commander's Rebuke
talents.effect: Trigger: An enemy within 30ft makes an attack against an ally. Effect: Make a Check (INT + Proficiency) vs. the enemy's Will Save Value. On success, the enemy's attack has Disadvantage.
talents.details: Shouting a distraction or order to disrupt the enemy.

talents.name: Tactical Reposition
talents.effect: Action: You and one willing ally you can see within 30 feet both move up to 15 feet. This movement does not provoke counter-attacks.
talents.details: Useful for getting a caster out of melee or a brute into it.

talents.name: Disarming Strike
talents.effect: Action: Make a melee Weapon Attack. On a Hit: Deal normal damage. The target must make a Reflex Save against your Attack Roll result. On a Failure, they drop one held item of your choice.
talents.details: Monsters without weapons suffer -2 Attack DC and reduced damage.

talents.name: Trip Attack
talents.effect: Action: Make a melee Weapon Attack. On a Hit: Deal normal damage. The target must make a Reflex Save against your Attack Roll result. On a Failure, they are knocked Prone.
talents.details: Prone enemies grant Advantage to melee attackers.

talents.name: Toughness
talents.effect: Your physical conditioning is superior. Your Maximum HP increases by 5.

talents.name: Weapon Specialization
talents.effect: Choose one Weapon Property (e.g., Sunder, Reach, Guard, Heavy). You gain a +1 Bonus to Attack Checks when using a weapon with that property.
talents.details: You can select this multiple times for different properties.

talents.name: Armor Training
talents.effect: You gain Proficiency with Heavy Armor. You ignore the CON +2 requirement for wearing it (you must still meet the STR requirement).
talents.details: Allows you to wear Heavy Armor without penalty.

talents.name: Tactical Mind
talents.effect: You apply your intellect to the flow of battle. Your Maximum Stamina increases by an amount equal to your INT Modifier (minimum 1).

archetypes.name: The Brute
archetypes.description: A terrifying force of raw, physical power. Fueled by adrenaline and aggression, the Brute smashes armor, terrifies foes, and shrugs off wounds that would kill a lesser warrior.

talents.name: Savage Strike
talents.effect: Trigger: When you hit with a melee weapon attack. Effect: Add 1d10 to the damage roll.
talents.details: Pure damage output. Best used on critical hits to multiply the dice.

talents.name: Reckless Attacks
talents.effect: Action: You enter a reckless stance for 1 minute. Effect: You have Advantage on all melee Attack Checks, but you have Disadvantage on all Defense Checks.
talents.details: High risk, high reward. Ensure you have the HP to survive the retaliation.

talents.name: Armor Sunder
talents.effect: Trigger: When you hit with a melee attack. Effect: The target's Armor Score (AS) is permanently reduced by 1. This effect can stack multiple times on the same target.
talents.details: Crucial for taking down heavily armored Soldiers or Constructs.

talents.name: Brutal Slam
talents.effect: Trigger: When you hit with a melee attack. Effect: Push the target 10 feet away. If they hit a wall or object, they take an additional 1d4 impact damage. Empower (1 STA): Push them 15 feet and knock them Prone.
talents.details: Good for positioning enemies into hazards or clearing space.

talents.name: Execute
talents.effect: Trigger: Before you make an attack against a target that is below 50% HP (Bloodied). Effect: You have Advantage on the Attack. If it hits, deal Double Damage (as if it were a Critical Hit).
talents.details: A finisher move. Requires you to identify the enemy's state first.

talents.name: Unstoppable Charge
talents.effect: Action: Move up to your full Speed in a straight line and make a melee Attack at the end of the move. If you moved at least 20 feet, the Attack has Advantage.
talents.details: Combines movement and attack into a single powerful opener.

talents.name: Terrifying Bellow
talents.effect: Action: Target one enemy within 30 feet. Make an Intimidation Check (CHA/STR + Prof) vs. their Will Save Value. Success: They are Frightened for 1 minute. Empower (2 STA): Affects ALL enemies within 30 feet.
talents.details: Frightened enemies cannot move closer and have Disadvantage on checks.

talents.name: Indomitable
talents.effect: Trigger: When you fail a check to resist the Stunned, Dazed, or Weakened conditions. Effect: Re-roll the check. You must use the new result.
talents.details: Keeps you in the fight when crowd control would otherwise stop you.

talents.name: Savage Howl
talents.effect: Trigger: When you reduce an enemy to 0 HP. Effect: Allies within 30 feet gain 1d4 Temporary HP. Enemies within 30 feet must save vs. Intimidation or be Frightened for 1 round.
talents.details: Turns a kill into a momentum swing for the whole team.

talents.name: Death or Glory
talents.effect: Action: Make a single melee Attack Check. Treat the result as an Automatic Critical Hit (Natural 20). Cost: You immediately take 1d6 Damage which cannot be reduced by Armor or Resistance.
talents.details: Guaranteed massive damage at the cost of your own blood.

talents.name: Mighty Leap
talents.effect: Action: Make an Athletics Check. You jump a number of feet horizontally equal to the result (or half vertically). If you land in an enemy's space, make an Attack vs Defense. Hit: Deal 1d6 Bludgeoning and knock them Prone.
talents.details: Bypasses difficult terrain and frontline defenders.

talents.name: Shieldbreaker
talents.effect: Action: Attack an object or a creature wielding a shield. Against Objects: Deal Double Damage. Against Creatures: On a hit, deal no damage, but their Shield is destroyed (Wooden) or unusable until repaired (Metal).
talents.details: Removes the +1/+2 Armor Score bonus from shielded enemies.

talents.name: Bloodied Rage
talents.effect: When you are at or below half your maximum HP, you gain a +1 bonus to all melee damage rolls.
talents.details: Encourages living on the edge.

talents.name: Heavy Weapon Master
talents.effect: When you wield a melee weapon with the Two-Handed property (e.g., Greataxe, Maul), you gain a +1 Bonus to Attack Checks.
talents.details: Makes heavy weapons more reliable.

talents.name: Vigorous
talents.effect: Your Maximum Stamina increases by an amount equal to your STR Modifier (minimum 1).

talents.name: Thick Hide
talents.effect: While you are Unarmored, you have a natural Armor Score (AS) of 2. This does not stack with worn armor, but stacks with Shields.
talents.details: Allows for a 'Barbarian' playstyle without mail.

talents.name: Menacing
talents.effect: You have Advantage on Intimidation Checks. Additionally, you can use your STR Modifier instead of CHA for Intimidation rolls.
talents.details: Makes you a social threat using physical presence.

talents.name: Iron Jaws
talents.effect: You have Advantage on checks to start or escape a Grapple. While grappling a creature, you can deal 1d4 damage as a Free Action once per turn.
talents.details: Turns you into a brawler.

talents.name: Brute's Fortitude
talents.effect: Your Maximum HP increases by an amount equal to your current level.

talents.name: Diehard
talents.effect: When you are at 0 HP and must make a CON Check (Death Save) to avoid dying, you have Advantage on the roll.
talents.details: Makes you significantly harder to kill.

archetypes.name: The Guardian
archetypes.description: The immovable object. A master of shields, heavy armor, and polearms who controls the battlefield, intercepts attacks, and refuses to let their allies fall.

talents.name: Bastion
talents.effect: Trigger: When you make a Block (CON) Defense Check. Effect: Add +1d6 to your roll. You must be wielding a Shield to use this maneuver.
talents.details: Turning a hit into a miss, or a crit into a glancing blow.

talents.name: Bodyguard
talents.effect: Trigger: When an ally within 10 feet is targeted by an attack. Effect: You move adjacent to them (no counter-attacks) and the attack targets you instead. You perform your Defense Check normally.
talents.details: You become the target. Works best if you have high Armor/Defense.

talents.name: Fortify
talents.effect: Action: You brace yourself against impact. Effect: Your Armor Score (AS) increases by +1 for 1 minute. Empower (1 STA): Increase AS by +2 instead.
talents.details: Stacks with worn armor and shields.

talents.name: Endure
talents.effect: Trigger: When you fail a check to resist Bleeding, Poisoned, or Burning. Effect: You grit your teeth and automatically pass the check instead.
talents.details: Shrugs off damage-over-time effects.

talents.name: Warning Strike
talents.effect: Trigger: When an enemy enters your weapon's Reach. Effect: Make a melee Attack Check against them immediately.
talents.details: Punishes enemies for trying to close the distance. Effective with Polearms.

talents.name: Retaliate
talents.effect: Trigger: When an enemy misses you with a melee attack. Effect: You have Advantage on your next melee Attack against that specific enemy.
talents.details: Wait for them to make a mistake, then punish it.

talents.name: Sweeping Strike
talents.effect: Action: Make a single melee Attack Check. Compare the result to the Defense DC of two adjacent enemies within your reach. Deal normal damage to both on a hit.
talents.details: Clears minions or damages clustered brutes.

talents.name: Guardian's Challenge
talents.effect: Action: Target one enemy. Make a Check (CON + Prof) vs. their Will Save Value. Success: They are Challenged for 1 minute. While Challenged, they have Disadvantage on any attack that does not target you.
talents.details: Forces the boss to focus on the tank.

talents.name: Shield Bash
talents.effect: Action: Make a Melee Attack with your Shield. Hit: Deal 1d4 damage and the target must make a Fortitude Save vs. your Attack Roll. Fail: Target is Dazed for 1 round.
talents.details: Dazed targets cannot take Reactions.

talents.name: Shoulder Check
talents.effect: Trigger: When you hit a creature with a melee attack. Effect: Make an Athletics (STR) Check vs. their Reflex Save. Success: Push them 5 feet.
talents.details: Useful for peeling enemies off squishy allies.

talents.name: Shield Wall
talents.effect: Action: You create a defensive bulwark. Until your next turn, you and all adjacent allies have Advantage on ALL Defense Checks (Dodge, Parry, Block).
talents.details: The ultimate formation tool.

talents.name: Pin
talents.effect: Action: Make a melee Attack. Hit: Deal normal damage and the target is Grappled (Speed 0, pinned to terrain) unless their Reflex Save beats your Attack roll. You cannot attack with this weapon while maintaining the Pin.
talents.details: Locks down a single target completely.

talents.name: Guardian's Fortitude
talents.effect: Your physical conditioning is immense. Your Maximum HP increases by an amount equal to your CON + STR Modifiers (minimum 1).

talents.name: Armored Behemoth
talents.effect: While wearing Heavy Armor, you gain +1 Armor Score (AS), you can use the Dash action (normally forbidden), and you ignore Disadvantage on Athletics checks.
talents.details: Essential for Heavy Armor users to stay mobile.

talents.name: Improved Brace
talents.effect: You can use the 'Brace' weapon property (normally an Action) as a Move Action instead.
talents.details: Allows you to set a spear against a charge and still attack or move.

talents.name: Stand Your Ground
talents.effect: You have Advantage on checks to resist being Knocked Prone, Grappled, or moved against your will.
talents.details: You cannot be easily displaced.

talents.name: Guardian's Vigor
talents.effect: Your Maximum Stamina increases by an amount equal to your CON Modifier (minimum 1).

talents.name: Protector's Resolve
talents.effect: When you are at or below half your maximum HP (Bloodied), all adjacent allies gain a +1 Bonus to their Defense Checks.
talents.details: You fight harder when hurt.

talents.name: Shield Master
talents.effect: Your shield becomes an extension of your body. You gain a permanent +1 Bonus to Block (CON) Defense Checks.
talents.details: Makes blocking very reliable.

talents.name: Tower Shield Training
talents.effect: You can wield a Tower Shield effectively. Your Shield's Armor Score bonus increases to +2 (Total), but you have Disadvantage on Parry checks.
talents.details: Trades weapon deflection for raw damage absorption.

archetypes.name: The Skirmisher
archetypes.description: A blur of motion on the battlefield. Whether an elusive archer, a dual-wielding dervish, or a martial artist, the Skirmisher relies on speed, precision, and evasion rather than armor.

talents.name: Nimble
talents.effect: Trigger: When you make a Dodge (DEX) Defense Check or an Acrobatics Check. Effect: Add +1d6 to your roll.
talents.details: The ultimate survival tool for light armor users.

talents.name: Freeflow
talents.effect: Action: You move up to your full Speed. This movement does not provoke Opportunity Attacks (Disengage).
talents.details: Standard tactical repositioning.

talents.name: Piercing Shot
talents.effect: Trigger: When you make a Ranged Attack. Effect: The attack ignores 2 points of the target's Armor Score. Empower (1 STA): Ignore ALL Armor Score.
talents.details: Crucial for archers facing armored targets.

talents.name: Called Shot
talents.effect: Trigger: Declare before making a Ranged Attack. Effect: On a Hit, the target takes normal damage and gains the Bleeding condition (1d4 damage/turn) unless their Fortitude Save equals or exceeds your Attack Roll.
talents.details: Trading stamina for damage-over-time.

talents.name: Stunning Strike
talents.effect: Trigger: When you hit with an Unarmed Strike. Effect: The target is Stunned (Incapacitated) for 1 round unless their Fortitude Save equals or exceeds your Attack Roll.
talents.details: A high-cost game changer.

talents.name: Flurry
talents.effect: Trigger: When you make an attack with your main hand weapon. Effect: You can make Two off-hand attacks instead of one this turn.
talents.details: Note: Off-hand attacks suffer Disadvantage unless you have the Dual-Wielding Expert passive.

talents.name: Redirect
talents.effect: Trigger: When you successfully Dodge a melee attack. Effect: You and one ally adjacent to the enemy gain Advantage on your next melee Attack Check against that enemy.
talents.details: Punish them for missing.

talents.name: Acrobatic Tumble
talents.effect: Action: Move up to your full Speed. You can move through enemy spaces without provoking attacks. After moving, make an Acrobatics Check (DC 13). Success: Your next attack this turn has Advantage.
talents.details: Getting behind enemy lines.

talents.name: Quick Shot
talents.effect: Action: Make Two separate Ranged Attack Checks. These can be against the same or different targets. Note: Cannot be used with weapons that have the 'Reload' property (like Crossbows) unless you have the Quick Reload passive.
talents.details: Volume of fire over precision.

talents.name: Parting Shot
talents.effect: Action: Move up to half your Speed without provoking counter-attacks. At any point during this move, make a single Ranged Attack Check.
talents.details: Kiting tactic.

talents.name: Snap Shot
talents.effect: Trigger: An enemy moves into your weapon's normal range or makes a ranged attack against you. Effect: Make a Ranged Attack Check against them immediately.
talents.details: The ranged equivalent of an Opportunity Attack.

talents.name: Vaulting Strike
talents.effect: Action: Make an Acrobatics Check (DC 13). Success: Jump over a Medium or smaller creature to an unoccupied space behind them. This movement does not provoke attacks. Land and make a Melee Attack with Advantage.
talents.details: Parkour combat.

talents.name: Agile Movement
talents.effect: Your base Speed increases by 5 feet.
talents.details: Simple, always useful.

talents.name: Ranged Specialist
talents.effect: You gain a +1 Bonus to Attack Checks with Ranged Weapons.
talents.details: Essential for archers.

talents.name: Dual-Wielding Expert
talents.effect: Rank 1: You no longer have Disadvantage on off-hand attacks. Rank 2: You add your Ability Modifier to the damage of off-hand attacks.
talents.details: Must be taken twice to unlock full potential.

talents.name: Unarmored Defense
talents.effect: While you are wearing no armor, your Armor Score (AS) is equal to your DEX Modifier (Max +3). Shields can still be used.
talents.details: Allows high defense without the stealth penalty of armor.

talents.name: Martial Arts
talents.effect: Your Unarmed Strike gains the Finesse and Light properties. Its damage increases from 1d4 to 1d6.
talents.details: Required for Monk-style builds.

talents.name: Quick Reload
talents.effect: You can reload a weapon with the 'Reload' property (e.g., Crossbows) as a Free Action instead of a Move Action.
talents.details: Changes Crossbows from 1 shot/round to multi-shot capable.

talents.name: Flow State
talents.effect: Your Maximum Stamina increases by an amount equal to your DEX or WIS Modifier (whichever is higher, minimum 1).
talents.details: Ensures you have the fuel for your maneuvers.

talents.name: Evasive
talents.effect: You gain a permanent +1 Bonus to Dodge (DEX) Defense Checks.
talents.details: The best defense is not being there.

archetypes.name: The Rogue
archetypes.description: A master of stealth, deception, and dirty fighting. The Rogue relies on Luck to survive impossible odds and a belt full of dangerous tools to create chaos.

talents.name: Vanish
talents.effect: Action: You slip into the shadows. Teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space that has Cover or Dim Light. You immediately gain the Hidden condition.
talents.details: Allows you to hide even while being observed.

talents.name: Sucker Punch
talents.effect: Free Action: Trigger when you hit a creature that is Flanked, Blinded, or Stunned. Roll your damage dice twice and add them together (Double Damage).
talents.details: Turns a tactical advantage into a kill.

talents.name: Slippery
talents.effect: Reaction: Trigger when you are targeted by an attack or spell. You move 10 feet immediately. This movement does not provoke counter-attacks. If this movement takes you out of the attack's Range or Line of Sight, the attack fails.
talents.details: The ultimate evasion tool.

talents.name: Cheat Death
talents.effect: Reaction: Trigger when you take damage that reduces you to 0 HP. You are instead reduced to 1 HP.
talents.details: Luck is a finite resource; use it when it counts.

talents.name: Exploit Opening
talents.effect: Reaction: Trigger when an enemy misses you with a melee attack. That enemy is considered Flanked by you until the end of your next turn.
talents.details: Allows you to trigger Backstabber solo.

talents.name: Master of Locks
talents.effect: Action: Make a Stealth & Thievery Check on a non-magical lock or trap mechanism. Treat the d20 roll as a Natural 20 (Automatic Success).
talents.details: Bypasses the risk of a Whiff on critical entry tasks.

talents.name: Gouge
talents.effect: Action: Make a Melee Attack Check (using DEX or STR). On a Hit: Deal 1d4 Damage and the target is Blinded until the start of your next turn.
talents.details: Sand in the eyes, or a cut to the brow.

talents.name: Shadow Walk
talents.effect: Action: You move up to your Full Speed. During this move, you can pass through enemy spaces and ignore Difficult Terrain. You do not provoke counter-attacks.
talents.details: Essential for reaching the backline.

talents.name: Recipe: Flash Powder
talents.effect: Unlock Recipe. Item Effect: Thrown (30ft). 10ft Radius. Creatures must make a Fortitude Save vs. Craft DC or be Blinded for 1 round.
talents.details: Crafting this item requires 1 Scrap Bundle.

talents.name: Recipe: Assassin's Shiv
talents.effect: Unlock Recipe. Item Effect: Small, concealable blade. Melee Attack. On Hit: 1d4 Damage + Bleeding condition (1 min). The Shiv breaks after use.
talents.details: Perfect for prison breaks or social stealth.

talents.name: Recipe: Smoke Bomb
talents.effect: Unlock Recipe. Item Effect: Thrown (30ft). Creates a 10ft Radius cloud. The area is Heavily Obscured (blocks Line of Sight) for 1 minute.
talents.details: Blocks archers and allows for Hiding.

talents.name: Backstabber
talents.effect: You deal an additional +1d6 Damage when you hit an enemy that is Flanked, Surprised, or Stunned.
talents.details: This bonus damage is multiplied on a Critical Hit.

talents.name: Uncanny Dodge
talents.effect: Rank 1: You become Trained (d4) in Dodge (DEX) Defense. Rank 2: You become Expert (d6).

talents.name: Poisoner's Guile
talents.effect: You can apply a poison/toxin to a weapon or piece of ammunition as a Move Action (normally a Standard Action).
talents.details: Essential for maintaining dps with coated weapons.

talents.name: Trapfinder
talents.effect: You have Advantage on Scrutiny checks to find traps and Craft & Tinker checks to disarm them.
talents.details: You are the party's minesweeper.

talents.name: Cunning
talents.effect: Your Maximum Luck increases by 1.

talents.name: Expertise
talents.effect: Choose one Skill you are Trained in (Stealth, Deception, Influence, Scrutiny). You become Expert (d6) in that skill.

talents.name: Poisoner
talents.effect: Gain Proficiency with the Poisoner's Kit. You automatically learn the recipes for Basic Toxin (1 Organics) and Befuddling Toxin (1 Organics).
talents.details: Enables the crafting and use of poisons.

talents.name: Saboteur
talents.effect: Gain Proficiency with Thieves' Tools. You automatically learn the recipes for Caltrops (1 Scrap) and Grease Vial (1 Organics).
talents.details: Enables lockpicking and trap disarmament.

talents.name: Master of Stealth
talents.effect: You have Advantage on all Stealth & Thievery (DEX) Checks.
talents.details: You are nearly impossible to spot.

talents.name: Light Footed
talents.effect: Your base Speed increases by 5 feet. You have Advantage on Acrobatics checks to balance or move quietly.
talents.details: Speed is life.

archetypes.name: The Warden
archetypes.description: A master of the wild, traps, and tracking. The Warden controls the battlefield with snares, supports the party with herbal remedies, and fights alongside a loyal beast.

talents.name: Hunter's Mark
talents.effect: Action: Target one creature you can see. Make a Scrutiny Check vs. their Will Save. Success: You Mark them for 1 minute. You have Advantage on Tracking checks and Ranged Attacks against the Marked target.
talents.details: Focus fire on the biggest threat.

talents.name: Wild Cunning
talents.effect: Reaction: Trigger when you fail a check to resist an Environmental Hazard (e.g., rockfall, vines) or the Exhausted/Poisoned condition. Effect: You automatically Pass the check instead.
talents.details: Survive where others perish.

talents.name: Cornered Beast
talents.effect: Reaction: Trigger when you are hit by a melee attack. Effect: Immediately make a single Melee Attack Check against the attacker. If you are below 50% HP, this attack has Advantage.
talents.details: Punish enemies for closing the distance.

talents.name: Coordinated Attack
talents.effect: Reaction: Trigger when you hit a creature with an attack. Effect: Command your Beast Companion to immediately use its Reaction to make an Attack against the same target.
talents.details: Burst damage using your pet.

talents.name: Hunter's Insight
talents.effect: Action: Observe a creature for a moment. The GM must truthfully reveal one piece of tactical info: Current HP, a Vulnerability, an Immunity, or its highest Attribute.
talents.details: Knowledge is power.

talents.name: Survivor's Grit
talents.effect: Action: Touch yourself or an ally. For 1 minute, the target has Advantage on all Saving Throws made to resist negative conditions (Stunned, Paralyzed, etc.).
talents.details: Pre-emptive protection against controllers.

talents.name: Primal Attunement
talents.effect: Action: For 1 minute, you gain Blindsight (30ft). You can sense all living creatures within this range, even if they are Hidden or Invisible. You cannot be Surprised.
talents.details: No ambush can catch you.

talents.name: Entangling Shot
talents.effect: Action: Make a Ranged Attack. On a Hit: Deal normal damage and the target is Grappled (pinned to the ground) by an arrow or bolt. Escape DC equals your Attack Roll result.
talents.details: Lock down a fleeing foe.

talents.name: Recipe: Iron-Jaw Trap
talents.effect: Unlock Recipe. Item Effect: Action to Set. Trigger: Next creature to enter space. Effect: 2d6 Piercing Damage + Restrained. (Craft DC 13).
talents.details: A heavier, deadlier version of the Snare.

talents.name: Recipe: Numbing Paste
talents.effect: Unlock Recipe. Item Effect: Action to Apply. Target gains 1d8 Temporary HP and ignores the effects of the 'Pain' or 'Weakened' condition for 1 hour. (Craft DC 13).
talents.details: Essential for tanking hits.

talents.name: Recipe: Net Trap
talents.effect: Unlock Recipe. Item Effect: Action to Set (Tripwire). Trigger: Next creature to enter space. Effect: Target is hoisted into the air (Restrained) and takes 1d6 Fall damage if cut down. (Craft DC 11).
talents.details: Good for capturing live bounties.

talents.name: Beast Companion
talents.effect: You gain a loyal animal (Wolf, Boar, or Bird). It acts on your turn (requires your Move action to command). Stats: HP = Level x 5. AC 1. Dmg 1d6. If it dies, you must spend Downtime to find a new one.
talents.details: The core feature of the class.

talents.name: Master Trapper
talents.effect: Gain Proficiency with Thieves' Tools. You automatically learn the recipes for Snare Trap (1 Scrap) and Bell Tripwire (1 Scrap). You have Advantage to set or conceal traps.
talents.details: Enables basic trap gameplay.

talents.name: Master Herbalist
talents.effect: Gain Proficiency with Herbalism Kit. You automatically learn the recipes for Healing Salve (1 Flora) and Antidote (1 Flora).
talents.details: Enables healing gameplay.

talents.name: Tougher Companion
talents.effect: Your companion evolves. Its Max HP becomes Level x 10. Its Armor Score becomes 2. Its damage die increases to 1d8.
talents.details: Necessary for keeping the pet alive at higher levels.

talents.name: Deadeye
talents.effect: You gain a +1 Bonus to Attack Checks with Shortbows and Longbows. You do not suffer Disadvantage for attacking at Long Range.
talents.details: Become a sniper.

talents.name: Wilderness Dweller
talents.effect: You have Advantage on Stealth checks in natural environments (forest, jungle, cave). You ignore natural Difficult Terrain.
talents.details: Master of your environment.

talents.name: Endurance
talents.effect: You have Advantage on checks to resist Exhaustion (Cold/Hunger). Your Maximum HP increases by 3.
talents.details: Hard to kill via attrition.

talents.name: Survivor's Cunning
talents.effect: Your Maximum Luck increases by 1.

talents.name: Pinning Shot
talents.effect: When you land a Critical Hit with a Bow or Crossbow, the target is Grappled (pinned to terrain). Escape DC 13.
talents.details: Adds crowd control to your crits.

talents.name: Primal Bond Selection
talents.effect: Choose your bond type: Hunter (+1 Ranged/Tracking) or Beast (+1 Companion AS/Dmg).

archetypes.name: The Leader
archetypes.description: A commander who inspires allies and manipulates enemies. Their voice is a weapon, turning the tide of battle through coordination, morale, and social engineering.

talents.name: Inspiring Word
talents.effect: Reaction: Trigger when an ally within 30ft fails a d20 Check. Effect: They immediately Re-roll the check with Advantage. They must use the new result.
talents.details: Can save a life on a Death Save or ensure a critical attack lands.

talents.name: Get in Position!
talents.effect: Action: Command one ally you can see. Effect: That ally can immediately use their Reaction to move up to their Full Speed. This movement does not provoke counter-attacks.
talents.details: Perfect for rescuing a wizard or sending a brute to the front.

talents.name: Coordinated Strike
talents.effect: Reaction: Trigger when you hit an enemy with an attack. Effect: Choose one ally within 30ft. That ally can immediately use their Reaction to make a single Weapon Attack against the same enemy.
talents.details: Doubles the output of your action by leveraging a stronger ally.

talents.name: Rallying Cry
talents.effect: Action: Deliver a stirring speech. One willing ally within 30ft immediately regains 1d6 + CHA Modifier Hit Points. If they are at 0 HP, they also stand up.
talents.details: A verbal-only heal, effective even when bound or disarmed.

talents.name: Distracting Banter
talents.effect: Action: Target one enemy who can hear you. Make an Influence Check vs. their Will Save Value. Success: The target is Dazed (Action OR Move only) for 1 round as they hesitate or argue back.
talents.details: Breaks the action economy of elite enemies.

talents.name: Terrifying Presence
talents.effect: Action: Target one enemy. Make an Intimidation Check vs. their Will Save Value. Success: The target is Frightened of you for 1 minute. They cannot move closer to you and have Disadvantage on attacks.
talents.details: Excellent for peeling melee enemies off yourself.

talents.name: Selfless Sacrifice
talents.effect: Reaction: Trigger when an ally within 30ft takes damage. Effect: Shout a warning. The damage they take is Halved (Round down).
talents.details: Mitigates massive spikes of damage from bosses.

talents.name: Fast Friends
talents.effect: Action: Make an Influence Check (DC 13) against a non-hostile NPC. Success: Their attitude improves to 'Helpful' for 10 minutes. They will share secrets, lower prices (10%), or grant access to restricted areas.
talents.details: Bypasses long roleplay negotiations when time is tight.

talents.name: Recipe: Disguise Kit
talents.effect: Unlock Recipe. Item Effect: Action to apply. You adopt a new persona for 1 hour. You have Advantage on Deception checks to maintain this identity. (Craft DC 11).
talents.details: Consumable makeup, wigs, and prosthetics.

talents.name: Recipe: Forged Documents
talents.effect: Unlock Recipe. Item Effect: Create official-looking papers (Travel Writ, Guild License, Royal Decree). Grants Advantage on Influence checks involving authority figures. (Craft DC 13).
talents.details: The pen is mightier than the sword.

talents.name: Inspiring Vitality
talents.effect: At the start of combat (Initiative Count 0), all allies who can hear you (including yourself) gain 1d4 Temporary Hit Points.
talents.details: A buffer against the first blow of every fight.

talents.name: Loyal Follower
talents.effect: You gain a Hireling (Squire, Porter, or Herald) who serves for free. They are a non-combatant (1 HP, no attacks) but carry loot and perform simple tasks. If killed, replace via Downtime.
talents.details: Never carry your own torch again.

talents.name: Demoralizing Strike
talents.effect: Free Action: When you hit an enemy with a weapon attack, make an Intimidation Check vs. their Will Save Value. Success: Their next attack has Disadvantage. Limit: You can use this a number of times per combat equal to your CHA Modifier.
talents.details: Weave social attacks into physical combat.

talents.name: Lend Expertise
talents.effect: When you use the Help action to aid an ally's skill check, they gain Advantage AND add your Proficiency Die to their roll.
talents.details: Makes you the ultimate assistant.

talents.name: Negotiator
talents.effect: Action: Make an Influence Check vs. a hostile leader's Will Save Value. Success: Combat pauses for 1 round for a parley. The pause ends instantly if any violence occurs.
talents.details: A chance to surrender, bribe, or flee.

talents.name: Commanding
talents.effect: Your Maximum Luck increases by 1.

talents.name: Expertise
talents.effect: Choose one Trained Skill (Influence, Deception, Intimidation). You become Expert (d6) in that skill.

talents.name: Commander's Presence
talents.effect: Allies within 10 feet of you gain a +1 Bonus to Saving Throws made to resist Fear or Charm effects.
talents.details: Keeps the party disciplined.

talents.name: Master of Disguise
talents.effect: Gain Proficiency with the Disguise Kit. You can mimic specific individuals or change your apparent ancestry/gender without penalty.
talents.details: Necessary for deep cover infiltration.

talents.name: Master of Forgery
talents.effect: Gain Proficiency with the Forgery Kit. Only a trained specialist (or successful Scrutiny DC 15+) can attempt to spot your fakes.
talents.details: Falsify orders, signatures, and seals.

archetypes.name: The Crafter
archetypes.description: A master of preparation and inventory. You solve problems with alchemy, clockwork gadgets, and the right tool for the job. Your power is limited only by your supplies.

talents.name: Alchemical Eye
talents.effect: Action: Analyze a substance, potion, or goo. The GM must truthfully reveal its nature, effects, and if it is valuable or dangerous.
talents.details: Never drink a mystery potion again.

talents.name: Jerry-Rig
talents.effect: Reaction: Trigger when a non-magical item (weapon, shield, lockpick) breaks. Effect: You instantly hold it together with wire/tape. It functions normally for 10 minutes or the end of combat, then breaks permanently.
talents.details: Saves you from a critical fumble at the worst moment.

talents.name: Volatile Admixture
talents.effect: Free Action: Trigger when you use a Damaging Reagent (e.g., Bomb, Acid). Effect: Choose one: 1. Maximize the damage roll. 2. Increase the Blast Radius by 5 feet.
talents.details: Turns a standard flask into a heavy hitter.

talents.name: Rapid Assembly
talents.effect: Action: You throw together a device in seconds. Create 1 Reagent from any Recipe you know without spending Downtime. You must still pay the Material Cost. The item is unstable and becomes useless at the end of the encounter.
talents.details: Crafting in combat.

talents.name: Salvage
talents.effect: Reaction: Trigger when you miss with a Thrown Reagent or a Trap fails to trigger. Effect: You recover the item intact. It is added back to your inventory.
talents.details: Mitigates resource waste on bad rolls.

talents.name: Overclock
talents.effect: Action: You supercharge your Clockwork Companion. For 1 minute, its Speed doubles, its Armor Score increases by +2, and it can take an Action on your turn without requiring you to spend a Move.
talents.details: Turns your drone into a combatant.

talents.name: Kit: Alchemist
talents.effect: Gain Proficiency with the Alchemist's Kit. You learn the recipes for: Alchemist's Fire (1 Organics) and Acid Flask (1 Organics).
talents.details: The foundation for splash damage.

talents.name: Kit: Tinker
talents.effect: Gain Proficiency with Thieves' Tools. You learn the recipes for: Flashbomb (1 Scrap) and Smoke Bomb (1 Organics).
talents.details: Utility grenades for escape and control.

talents.name: Kit: Herbalist
talents.effect: Gain Proficiency with Herbalism Kit. You learn the recipes for: Healing Salve (1 Flora) and Stamina Brew (1 Flora).
talents.details: The party medic role.

talents.name: Kit: Poisoner
talents.effect: Gain Proficiency with Poisoner's Kit. You learn the recipes for: Basic Toxin (1 Organics) and Befuddling Toxin (1 Organics).
talents.details: Debuff enemies with coated weapons.

talents.name: Advanced Alchemy
talents.effect: You learn complex formulas. Recipes: Adrenaline Shot (1 Organics) and Stone-Skin Elixir (1 Mineral/Scrap).
talents.details: High-tier buffs.

talents.name: Advanced Tinkering
talents.effect: You learn complex mechanics. Recipes: Tanglefoot Bag (1 Flora) and Spring-Loaded Dagger (1 Scrap).
talents.details: Crowd control and surprise damage.

talents.name: Quick Hand
talents.effect: You can use any 'Thrown' Reagent (e.g., Acid, Bombs) as a Move Action instead of a Standard Action.
talents.details: Allows you to Move, Throw, and Attack in one turn.

talents.name: Demolitionist
talents.effect: When you use a Reagent that deals damage, add your INT Modifier to the damage roll.
talents.details: Makes low-tier items scale with your level.

talents.name: Efficient Crafter
talents.effect: When you succeed on a Crafting Check during Downtime, you create 1 additional item (e.g., 4 bombs instead of 3) at no extra material cost.
talents.details: Stretch your resources further.

talents.name: Field Repair
talents.effect: Action: Spend 1 Dungeon Turn to repair a broken non-magical item (DC 11 Craft Check). No kit required.
talents.details: Fix doors, carts, or weapons in the dungeon.

talents.name: Field Medic
talents.effect: You can apply a Healing Salve, Potion, or Poultice to an adjacent ally as a Move Action.
talents.details: Combat healing efficiency.

talents.name: Reagent Belt
talents.effect: Your backpack is perfectly organized. You gain +2 Inventory Slots.

talents.name: Clockwork Companion
talents.effect: You build a mechanical helper (Spider/Bird). HP=Level*2. AS 2. Dmg 1d4. It acts on your turn (requires Move to direct). If destroyed, rebuild during Downtime for 1 Scrap.
talents.details: A scout and flank buddy.

talents.name: Tinkerer's Cunning
talents.effect: Your Maximum Luck increases by 1.

archetypes.name: The Arcanist
archetypes.description: The academic of the arcane. You treat magic as a science, mastering spells through study, modification, and raw elemental force. You are the artillery and the architect of the battlefield.

talents.name: Firebolt
talents.effect: Action: Range 60ft. Make a Ranged Casting Check (vs Defense). On a Hit: Deal 2d6 Fire Damage.
talents.details: A standard, reliable attack spell. Base DC 11.

talents.name: Arcane Bolt
talents.effect: Action: Range 30ft. Make a Casting Check (DC 11). Success: The bolt unerringly strikes the target. Deal 1d4+1 Force Damage.
talents.details: Ignores Armor Score and Cover. Low damage, but guaranteed hit.

talents.name: Magic Missile
talents.effect: Action: Range 60ft. Make a Casting Check (DC 13). Success: Create 2 missiles. They strike automatically. Each deals 1d4 Force Damage. You can target different creatures.
talents.details: Reliable chip damage or minion clearing.

talents.name: Ray of Frost
talents.effect: Action: Range 30ft. Make a Ranged Casting Check (vs Defense). On a Hit: Deal 1d8 Cold Damage. Unless the target's Fortitude Save beats your Check, their Speed is Halved for 1 round.
talents.details: Good for kiting melee enemies.

talents.name: Lightning Shock
talents.effect: Action: Range Touch. Make a Melee Casting Check (vs Defense). On a Hit: Deal 1d10 Lightning Damage. Unless the target's Reflex Save beats your Check, they cannot use Reactions for 1 round.
talents.details: Disables Opportunity Attacks, allowing safe movement.

talents.name: Burning Hands
talents.effect: Action: 15ft Cone. Make a Casting Check (DC 11). This sets the Save DC. All creatures in the area take 2d6 Fire Damage (Reflex Save for Half).
talents.details: Close-range crowd control.

talents.name: Shield
talents.effect: Action: Make a Casting Check (DC 11). Success: You create a barrier of force. You gain +2 Armor Score (AS) for 1 minute.
talents.details: Stacks with worn armor, unlike Mage Armor.

talents.name: Mage Armor
talents.effect: Action: Range Touch. Make a Casting Check (DC 11). Success: Target unarmored creature's Base Armor Score becomes 1 for 1 hour.
talents.details: Essential for survival without physical armor.

talents.name: Feather Fall
talents.effect: Reaction: Trigger when you or a creature within 30ft falls. Make a Casting Check (DC 9). Success: The target descends slowly and takes 0 Falling Damage.
talents.details: Saves lives in vertical dungeons.

talents.name: Grease
talents.effect: Action: Range 30ft. Make a Casting Check (DC 11). Success: A 10ft square becomes Difficult Terrain. Creatures entering or starting there fall Prone unless their Reflex Save beats your Check.
talents.details: Non-concentration battlefield control.

talents.name: Web
talents.effect: Action: Range 30ft. Make a Casting Check (DC 13). Success: Create a 15ft cube of sticky webs (Difficult Terrain). Creatures starting there are Grappled unless Reflex Save beats your Check.
talents.details: Flammable. Burns away if hit by Fire damage.

talents.name: Sleep
talents.effect: Action: Range 30ft. Make a Casting Check (DC 11). Success: Roll 3d8. This is the total HP of creatures affected in a 15ft area. Starting with the lowest HP, targets fall Unconscious (1 min) until the pool is depleted.
talents.details: Extremely powerful against Minions and wounded foes.

talents.name: Identify
talents.effect: Action: Touch one object. Make a Casting Check (DC 9). Success: Learn the magical properties, functions, and command words of the item. Takes 1 Dungeon Turn (10 mins).
talents.details: Required to use found magic items safely.

talents.name: Dispel Magic
talents.effect: Action: Range 60ft. Target one magical effect. Make a Casting Check (DC 13). Success: The spell or effect ends immediately.
talents.details: Can strip buffs from enemies or clear traps.

talents.name: Arcane Recovery
talents.effect: Action: You enter a short meditative trance to reorganize your mind. Regain 1d4 Mana Points (MP). Usable once per Long Rest.
talents.details: Vital for sustaining a long dungeon crawl.

talents.name: Arcane Potency
talents.effect: When you roll damage for a Spell, add your INT Modifier to the total.
talents.details: Makes even basic cantrips dangerous.

talents.name: Arcane Focus
talents.effect: You gain a permanent +1 Bonus to all Casting Checks.
talents.details: Reduces the chance of Magic Mishaps.

talents.name: Expanded Mind
talents.effect: Your Maximum Mana (MP) increases by 2.

talents.name: Arcane Studies
talents.effect: Choose one Trained Skill (Lore, Investigate, Craft). You become Expert (d6) in that skill.

talents.name: Arcane Specialization
talents.effect: Choose one Spell Modification (Empower, Range, Widen, Subtle). When you apply this mod to a spell, the DC increase is +1 (instead of the normal +2).
talents.details: Allows for safer pushing of spells.

archetypes.name: The Occultist
archetypes.description: A wielder of forbidden power who bargains with dark entities. You pay for magic with blood, sanity, and the souls of your enemies. You are the most dangerous caster... sometimes to yourself.

talents.name: Blood Bolt
talents.effect: Action: Range 30ft. You fuel this spell with your own vitality instead of Mana. Take 2 Damage (unavoidable). Make a Ranged Casting Check (vs Defense). On a Hit: Deal 1d10 Necrotic Damage.
talents.details: A powerful cantrip that slowly kills you.

talents.name: Hex
talents.effect: Action: Range 30ft. Casting Check vs. Target's Will Save. Success: Target is Cursed (1 min). Choose one Stat (STR, DEX, etc.); they have Disadvantage on checks with it. You deal +1d4 Necrotic damage on all hits against them.
talents.details: No concentration required, but you can only have one Hex active at a time.

talents.name: Ray of Sickness
talents.effect: Action: Range 30ft. Ranged Casting Check. On Hit: Deal 1d8 Poison Damage. Unless the target's Fortitude Save beats your Check, they are Poisoned for 1 minute.
talents.details: Poisoned creatures take 1d6 damage at the start of their turn.

talents.name: Fear
talents.effect: Action: 15ft Cone. Make one Casting Check (DC 13). All creatures in the area become Frightened for 1 minute unless their Will Save beats your Check.
talents.details: Frightened creatures must flee and cannot move closer to you.

talents.name: Blindness
talents.effect: Action: Range 30ft. Casting Check (DC 13) vs. Target's Fortitude Save. Success: Target is Blinded for 1 minute. They can repeat the save at the end of their turns.
talents.details: Blinded enemies grant Advantage to attackers.

talents.name: Summon Imp
talents.effect: Action: Summon a tiny fiend for 1 hour. Stats: 5 HP, AS 1, Attack +2 (1d4 dmg). It obeys your verbal commands (no action required), but will try to twist the intent of your words.
talents.details: Great for scouting or flanking, risky for precise tasks.

talents.name: Shadow Armor
talents.effect: Action: Range Self. Wreathe yourself in shadows for 1 hour. You gain +1 Armor Score. You have Advantage on Stealth checks in dim light or darkness.
talents.details: Defensive and utility buff in one.

talents.name: Vampiric Touch
talents.effect: Action: Range Touch. Make a Melee Casting Check (vs Defense). On Hit: Deal 2d6 Necrotic Damage. You regain HP equal to half the damage dealt.
talents.details: Essential for sustaining Blood Magic usage.

talents.name: Charm Person
talents.effect: Action: Range 30ft. Target Humanoid. Casting Check (DC 11) vs. Will Save. Success: Target is Charmed (Friendly, cannot attack you) for 1 hour or until harmed.
talents.details: Combat ends if the leader is Charmed.

talents.name: Speak w/ Dead
talents.effect: Action: Touch a corpse. It animates briefly to answer 3 questions. It must answer truthfully, but can be cryptic or hostile. Takes 1 Dungeon Turn.
talents.details: The dead know secrets the living have forgotten.

talents.name: Dark Pulse
talents.effect: Action: 10ft Radius centered on YOU. Make one Casting Check (DC 13). All creatures in range (Enemies AND Allies, excluding you) take 1d8 Necrotic Damage and are Weakened unless Fortitude Save > Check.
talents.details: High impact, but friendly fire is guaranteed.

talents.name: Blood Price
talents.effect: Free Action: When casting a spell, you can pay the MP cost with Health instead. You take 2 Damage for every 1 MP you replace. This damage cannot be reduced or prevented.
talents.details: Cast even when tapped out, if you dare.

talents.name: Dark Bargain
talents.effect: Free Action: Declare before casting. You gain Advantage on the Casting Check. The Cost: If you roll a Natural 1 on EITHER die, you trigger a Magic Mishap immediately.
talents.details: Doubles your crit chance, but doubles your fumble chance.

talents.name: Consume Soul
talents.effect: Reaction: Trigger when a creature dies within 30ft of you. Effect: You rip its soul free and regain 1d4 MP. Usable once per combat.
talents.details: Keeps your mana pool flowing in long fights.

talents.name: Chaotic Power
talents.effect: When you roll damage for a spell, add your CHA Modifier to the total.
talents.details: Raw force of personality drives your magic.

talents.name: Dark Focus
talents.effect: You gain a permanent +1 Bonus to all Casting Checks.
talents.details: Your pact guides your hand.

talents.name: Pact Magic
talents.effect: Your Maximum MP increases by 2.

talents.name: Forbidden Knowledge
talents.effect: Choose one Trained Skill (Lore, Intimidation, Deception). You become Expert (d6) in that skill.

talents.name: Potent Curses
talents.effect: When a creature fails a Saving Throw against one of your spells that inflicts a Condition (e.g., Fear, Blindness), they also take 1d6 Psychic Damage.
talents.details: Adds bite to your crowd control.

talents.name: Dark Resilience
talents.effect: You have Advantage on checks to resist the Frightened or Charmed conditions.
talents.details: You have seen worse things in the dark.

archetypes.name: The Priest
archetypes.description: A conduit for divine power. You are the anchor of the party, providing healing, protection, and radiant judgment. You do not just pray; you demand miracles.

talents.name: Healing Word
talents.effect: Action: Range 30ft. Make a Casting Check (DC 11). Success: One willing creature regains 1d6 + WIS Modifier Hit Points.
talents.details: Can be cast on a Dying creature to stabilize them.

talents.name: Cure Wounds
talents.effect: Action: Range Touch. Make a Casting Check (DC 11). Success: One willing creature regains 2d6 Hit Points.
talents.details: More potent healing requires physical contact.

talents.name: Sacred Flame
talents.effect: Action: Range 30ft. Make a Ranged Casting Check (vs Defense). On a Hit: Deal 1d10 Radiant Damage. If the target is Undead, this damage Ignores Armor Score.
talents.details: Searing light that burns the unholy.

talents.name: Guiding Bolt
talents.effect: Action: Range 60ft. Make a Ranged Casting Check (vs Defense). On a Hit: Deal 2d6 Radiant Damage. The next Attack made against this target by an ally has Advantage.
talents.details: High damage and setup in one.

talents.name: Bless
talents.effect: Action: Range 30ft. Make a Casting Check (DC 13). Success: Choose up to 2 allies. For 1 minute, they gain a +1 Bonus to ALL d20 Checks (Attacks, Defense, Skills).
talents.details: The most efficient buff in the game.

talents.name: Shield of Faith
talents.effect: Action: Range 30ft. Make a Casting Check (DC 11). Success: One ally gains +1 Armor Score (AS) for 1 minute. This stacks with worn armor and shields.
talents.details: Can turn a tank into an invulnerable object.

talents.name: Protection from Evil
talents.effect: Action: Range Touch. Make a Casting Check (DC 11). Success: For 1 minute, the target has Advantage on Defense Checks against Undead, Fiends, and Aberrations.
talents.details: Vital when fighting Spirits or Horrors.

talents.name: Sanctuary
talents.effect: Action: Range Touch. Make a Casting Check (DC 13). Success: Target is Warded for 1 minute. Any enemy attempting to attack them must succeed on a Will Save vs. your Casting Check or lose the attack. Ends if the target attacks.
talents.details: Protect the VIP or yourself while healing.

talents.name: Turn Undead
talents.effect: Action: 30ft Cone. Make a Casting Check (DC 13). All Undead in the area must make a Will Save vs. your Check. Fail: They take 1d6 Radiant Damage and are Frightened for 1 minute.
talents.details: Forces the dead to flee or cower.

talents.name: Lesser Restoration
talents.effect: Action: Range Touch. Make a Casting Check (DC 13). Success: Immediately end one condition on the target: Blinded, Deafened, or Poisoned.
talents.details: Does not cure Diseases or Curses.

talents.name: Light
talents.effect: Action: Range Touch. Make a Casting Check (DC 9). Success: An object glows with Bright Light (20ft radius) for 1 hour.
talents.details: Free light source. Saves torches.

talents.name: Detect Magic
talents.effect: Action: Range Self. Make a Casting Check (DC 9). Success: For 10 minutes, you can see a faint aura around magical objects or effects within 30ft.
talents.details: Useful for looting and trap detection.

talents.name: Divine Intervention
talents.effect: Reaction: Trigger when an ally within 30ft fails a Saving Throw against a magical effect (e.g., Charm, Fear, Hex). Effect: Grant them an immediate Re-roll with Advantage.
talents.details: Can prevent a party wipe from crowd control.

talents.name: Prayer of Solace
talents.effect: Action: You recite a prayer of renewal. Regain 1d4 Mana Points (MP). Usable once per Long Rest.
talents.details: Ensures you have magic for the final boss.

talents.name: Radiant Potency
talents.effect: When you roll damage for a Spell, add your WIS Modifier to the total.
talents.details: Boosts your offensive prayers.

talents.name: Divine Focus
talents.effect: You gain a permanent +1 Bonus to all Casting Checks.
talents.details: Reduces the chance of fizzling a heal.

talents.name: Divine Will
talents.effect: Your Maximum Mana (MP) increases by 2.

talents.name: Theological Studies
talents.effect: Choose one Trained Skill (Lore, Scrutiny, Medicine). You become Expert (d6) in that skill.

talents.name: Blessed Healer
talents.effect: When you cast a spell that restores HP, you can re-roll any 1s on the dice. You must use the new result.
talents.details: Makes healing more consistent.

talents.name: Divine Alacrity
talents.effect: You can cast any Priest Spell with a base cost of 1 MP as a Move Action instead of a Standard Action.
talents.details: Allows you to Heal and Attack/Dash in the same turn.

archetypes.name: The Primalist
archetypes.description: The avatar of nature's fury. You are not a servant of the wild; you are the storm, the earthquake, and the beast. You shift forms to tear enemies apart or reshape the battlefield with grasping roots.

talents.name: Shapeshift (Wolf)
talents.effect: Action: Transform for 1 minute. While shifted: Speed 40ft. Unarmed Strike deals 1d6 (Finesse). Gain +1 Bonus to Dodge Checks. Cannot cast spells.
talents.details: Best for scouting or flanking enemies.

talents.name: Shapeshift (Bear)
talents.effect: Action: Transform for 1 minute. While shifted: Unarmed Strike deals 1d10. Gain +2 Armor Score (Natural Hide). Advantage on Athletics Checks. Cannot cast spells.
talents.details: Best for absorbing damage and holding the line.

talents.name: Primal Strike
talents.effect: Action: Range Touch. Your hand becomes a claw, fang, or stone fist. Make a Melee Casting Check. On Hit: Deal 2d8 Slashing/Bludgeoning Damage (Magic).
talents.details: A heavy melee hit that uses WIS instead of STR.

talents.name: Thorn Lash
talents.effect: Action: Range 30ft. Make a Ranged Casting Check. On Hit: Deal 1d6 Piercing Damage and pull the target 10 feet closer to you.
talents.details: Drag enemies into hazards or melee range.

talents.name: Entangle
talents.effect: Action: Range 30ft. Target a 15ft Square. The area becomes Difficult Terrain. Creatures entering or starting their turn there are Grappled unless Reflex Save > Casting Check.
talents.details: Locks down a choke point.

talents.name: Thunderwave
talents.effect: Action: 15ft Cone. Make a Casting Check (DC 11). Creatures in area take 2d6 Thunder Damage and are Pushed 10 feet unless Reflex Save > Check (Half damage, no push).
talents.details: Get-off-me tool.

talents.name: Call Lightning
talents.effect: Action: Range 60ft. Make a Ranged Casting Check (vs Defense). On Hit: Deal 3d6 Lightning Damage. If outdoors in a storm, deal 4d6.
talents.details: High single-target damage.

talents.name: Spike Growth
talents.effect: Action: Range 30ft. Target a 15ft Square. Area becomes Difficult Terrain. Any creature moving through it takes 1d6 Piercing Damage for every 5 feet moved.
talents.details: Punishes enemy movement severely.

talents.name: Barkskin
talents.effect: Action: Range Touch. Target gains +1 Armor Score (AS) for 1 minute. This stacks with worn armor and shields.
talents.details: Makes the tank tankier.

talents.name: Primal Vigor
talents.effect: Action: Range Self. Draw on the earth's strength. Gain 1d8 Temporary Hit Points for 1 minute.
talents.details: Pre-combat buffer.

talents.name: Gaseous Form
talents.effect: Action: Range Self. Transform into mist for 1 minute. Speed 10ft (Fly). Cannot attack/cast. Advantage on Dodge. Pass through small cracks. Resistance to Non-Magic damage.
talents.details: Ultimate escape or infiltration tool.

talents.name: Speak w/ Animals
talents.effect: Action: Range Self. You can speak with and understand natural beasts for 10 minutes. They are not compelled to help, but are generally neutral.
talents.details: Gather intel from rats and birds.

talents.name: Primal Recovery
talents.effect: Action: Meditate on the land. Regain 1d4 Mana Points (MP). Usable once per Long Rest.
talents.details: Sustain your magic over a long day.

talents.name: Primal Attunement
talents.effect: Action: Open your senses for 1 minute. You have Advantage on Scrutiny and Survival checks. You automatically sense the location of all living creatures within 30ft. Usable once per Long Rest.
talents.details: Detect ambushes and invisible foes.

talents.name: Primal Potency
talents.effect: When you roll damage for a Spell, add your WIS Modifier to the total.
talents.details: Boosts damage of spells and transformed attacks.

talents.name: Primal Focus
talents.effect: You gain a permanent +1 Bonus to all Casting Checks.
talents.details: Consistency in magic.

talents.name: Primal Heart
talents.effect: Your Maximum MP increases by 2.

talents.name: Primal Studies
talents.effect: Choose one Trained Skill (Survival, Scrutiny, Athletics). You become Expert (d6) in that skill.

talents.name: Primal Form
talents.effect: When you cast a Shapeshift spell, you gain Temporary HP equal to your Level.
talents.details: Makes combat forms more durable.

talents.name: Child of the Wild
talents.effect: You ignore non-magical Difficult Terrain (vines, rubble, mud). You have Advantage on Survival checks in nature.
talents.details: Mobility supremacy outdoors.

classes.name: Weapon Master
classes.description: The pinnacle of martial discipline. You see the battlefield as an equation and solve it with steel. You adapt your attacks to bypass defenses and command the flow of combat.

synergy_feats.name: Master's Flourish
synergy_feats.effect: You unleash a signature attack. Make a Weapon Attack with Advantage. On a Hit, deal normal damage and choose one tactical effect: 1. Sunder: Ignore the target's Armor Score entirely. 2. Disrupt: The target cannot use Reactions and has Disadvantage on its next attack. 3. Guard: You gain a +2 Bonus to all Defense Checks until the start of your next turn.

synergy_feats.name: Commanding Presence
synergy_feats.effect: You issue a complex order. Choose a number of allies equal to your INT Modifier. Those allies can immediately use their Reaction to perform one of the following: 1. Move up to 15 feet without provoking counter-attacks. 2. Make a single Attack Check with Advantage. 3. Gain a +1d6 Bonus to their Defense Checks until your next turn.

synergy_feats.name: Storm of Steel
synergy_feats.effect: You become a whirlwind of steel. Make one separate Melee Attack Check against EVERY enemy currently adjacent to you. Each of these attacks is made with Advantage and automatically ignores 2 points of the target's Armor Score.

classes.name: Conqueror
classes.description: A disciplined warlord and shock trooper. You apply overwhelming force with precision, shattering armor and terrifying foes to create openings for your squad.

synergy_feats.name: Shatter Defenses
synergy_feats.effect: Make a Weapon Attack with Advantage. On a Hit, deal normal damage and permanently reduce the target's Armor Score (AS) by 1. This effect represents shattered plates or torn hide and can stack multiple times on the same target.

synergy_feats.name: Shock and Awe
synergy_feats.effect: You unleash a command that is both tactical and terrifying. Choose One: 1. Awe: A number of allies equal to your INT Modifier can use their Reaction to move 15 feet without provoking counter-attacks. 2. Shock: All enemies within 30 feet must make a Will Save against your Intimidation Check. On a failure, they are Frightened for 1 round.

synergy_feats.name: Shatter the Line
synergy_feats.effect: You focus all your might into a single blow. Make one Attack against a target. 1. This attack is an Automatic Critical Hit (Natural 20). 2. The impact creates a shockwave; make an Athletics Check. All *other* enemies adjacent to the target must make a Reflex Save against your result or be Knocked Prone.

classes.name: Knight
classes.description: The armored bastion of order. You lead from the front, challenging the strongest foes to single combat and providing a bulwark for your allies.

synergy_feats.name: Knight's Challenge
synergy_feats.effect: You single out a foe. Target one enemy within 30 feet. Make a Check (using CON or INT) against their Will Save Value. On a Success, they are Challenged for 1 minute. While Challenged, they have Disadvantage on all attacks that do not target you. Additionally, the first time an ally hits them, that ally deals +1d8 Damage.

synergy_feats.name: Rallying Command
synergy_feats.effect: You issue a bolster command. Choose One: 1. Hold the Line: You and allies within 10 feet gain 1d8 Temporary Hit Points and Advantage on checks to resist Fear or being Knocked Prone. 2. Reposition: You and allies within 10 feet can immediately use a Reaction to move 15 feet without provoking counter-attacks.

synergy_feats.name: Unbreakable Vow
synergy_feats.effect: 1. You are immune to the Frightened condition and cannot be Knocked Prone or moved against your will. 2. Guardian's Intervention: When an ally within 10 feet is attacked, you can use your Reaction (costing 1 STA) to move adjacent to them and force the attack to target you instead.

classes.name: Swashbuckler
classes.description: A blur of charismatic confidence and flashing steel. You treat combat as a high-stakes game, feinting to create openings and tumbling out of reach.

synergy_feats.name: Flourish and Strike
synergy_feats.effect: You perform a dazzling maneuver. You can Move up to 15 feet without provoking counter-attacks. At any point during this move, make a single Weapon Attack with Advantage. If it hits, it deals Weapon Damage plus 1d6.

synergy_feats.name: Daring Riposte
synergy_feats.effect: Trigger: An enemy misses you with a melee attack. Effect: You immediately make a counter-attack against them with Advantage. On a Hit, deal Weapon Damage plus 1d10. The enemy is rattled and cannot use Reactions until the start of their next turn.

synergy_feats.name: Grand Duelist's Flurry
synergy_feats.effect: You become a blur of motion. Move up to your full Speed (ignoring counter-attacks and moving through enemies). Make 3 separate Attacks against a SINGLE target. Each attack is made with Advantage and ignores 2 points of the target's Armor Score.

classes.name: Berserker
classes.description: A force of nature fueled by pain and adrenaline. You don't just fight; you overwhelm, smashing armor and breaking wills with primal fury.

synergy_feats.name: Berserker's Rage
synergy_feats.effect: You unleash your inner beast for 1 minute. While Raging: 1. You gain a +2 Bonus to all melee damage rolls. 2. You are Immune to the Frightened condition. 3. You have Advantage on Athletics checks. Maintenance: You must make an Attack or take the 'Catch Breath' action every turn, otherwise the Rage ends early.

synergy_feats.name: Terrifying Savagery
synergy_feats.effect: You focus your rage into a single strike. Make a Melee Attack with Advantage. 1. This attack is an Automatic Critical Hit (Natural 20). 2. Whether you hit or miss, you unleash a roar. All enemies within 30 feet must make a Will Save against your Intimidation Check. On a failure, they are Frightened for 1 round.

synergy_feats.name: Blood-Fueled Rampage
synergy_feats.effect: 1. You are Immune to the Stunned condition. 2. Whenever you reduce an enemy to 0 HP with a melee attack, you immediately regain 1 Stamina. 3. Vengeful Strike: If an enemy reduces you to 0 HP, you can use your Reaction to make one final Melee Attack against them before falling.

classes.name: Bulwark
classes.description: A living fortress of muscle and steel. You hold the line not just with a shield, but with terrifying mass, sundering the weapons of those foolish enough to strike you.

synergy_feats.name: Overwhelming Assault
