synergy_feats.effect: Make a Melee Attack with Advantage. On a Hit, deal normal damage and choose one debilitation: 1. Sunder: Permanently reduce the target's Armor Score (AS) by 1. 2. Daze: The target is Dazed (can only take an Action or a Move) until the start of your next turn.

synergy_feats.name: Mass Challenge
synergy_feats.effect: You issue a terrifying roar. Make an Intimidation Check. All enemies within 30 feet must compare their Will Save Value to your result. On a failure, they suffer two effects: They are Frightened for 1 round, and they are Challenged (Disadvantage on attacks not targeting you) for 1 minute.

synergy_feats.name: Unstoppable Juggernaut
synergy_feats.effect: Your sheer mass becomes your greatest defense. 1. You are Immune to being Knocked Prone or moved against your will. 2. You are Immune to the Stunned condition. 3. Your total Armor Score increases by +1 (stacking with all other armor sources).

classes.name: Gladiator
classes.description: A master of spectacle and violence. You blend raw power with surprising speed, leaping into the fray to deliver devastating, crowd-pleasing blows.

synergy_feats.name: Savage Leap
synergy_feats.effect: You launch yourself across the battlefield. You can Move up to your full Speed without provoking counter-attacks. At any point during this move, make a single Melee Attack with Advantage. On a Hit, deal Weapon Damage plus an additional 1d8.

synergy_feats.name: Showman's Flourish
synergy_feats.effect: You make a dramatic attack designed to terrify. Attack with Advantage. Deal normal damage on a hit. Whether you hit or miss, make an Intimidation Check. All enemies within 30 feet who saw the attack must compare their Will Save Value to your result. On a failure, they are Frightened for 1 round.

synergy_feats.name: Whirlwind of Carnage
synergy_feats.effect: You become a vortex of steel. You can Move up to your full Speed, ignoring counter-attacks and moving through enemy spaces. During this move, you can make up to 3 separate Melee Attacks. Each deals an additional +1d6 Damage. If dual-wielding, off-hand attacks suffer no penalty.

classes.name: Aegis
classes.description: The immovable object. A selfless protector who finds glory in defense, holding the line with an iron will and absolute endurance.

synergy_feats.name: Aegis Stance
synergy_feats.effect: You plant your feet and become a living wall. For 1 round: 1. You are Immune to being Knocked Prone or moved against your will. 2. You gain a +1d6 Bonus to Block Checks. 3. You can use your Reaction to Intercept an attack on an ally within 10 feet for 0 Stamina (normally costs 1).

synergy_feats.name: Last Bastion
synergy_feats.effect: You create a 10-foot aura of resolve for 1 minute. 1. Enemies within 30 feet are Challenged unless their Will Save beats your CON Check. 2. Allies who start their turn in your aura gain 1d4 Temporary Hit Points.

synergy_feats.name: Immortal Aegis
synergy_feats.effect: 1. You have Advantage on checks to resist all negative conditions. 2. Once per combat, if you are reduced to 0 HP, you drop to 1 HP instead. 3. Your Maximum Stamina increases by an amount equal to your STR Modifier.

classes.name: Lancer
classes.description: The swift protector. A mobile bastion who uses speed to intercept attacks and positioning to control the flow of battle.

synergy_feats.name: Lancer's Intervention
synergy_feats.effect: Trigger: An ally you can see within 30 feet is targeted by an attack. Effect: You immediately move up to your Full Speed toward that ally without provoking counter-attacks. If you end your move adjacent to them, the attack targets you instead, and you make your Defense Check with Advantage.

synergy_feats.name: Flowing Defense
synergy_feats.effect: You enter a state of perfect, fluid defense until the start of your next turn. 1. You add +1d6 to ALL Defense Checks (Dodge, Parry, and Block). 2. Your movement does not provoke counter-attacks.

synergy_feats.name: Hurricane of Steel
synergy_feats.effect: You become a mobile fortress for 1 round. 1. All allies within 10 feet of you gain a +2 Bonus to their Defense Checks. 2. Any enemy that ends its turn within 10 feet of you takes 1d8 Damage (ignoring Armor). 3. You can move without provoking counter-attacks.

classes.name: Blade-Dancer
classes.description: A warrior-artist. Combat is a performance, a blur of motion and steel. You dodge lethal blows by a hair and deliver precise, deadly strikes.

synergy_feats.name: Blade-Dancer's Flow
synergy_feats.effect: You perform a deadly kata. You can Move up to your full Speed without provoking counter-attacks. At any point during this move, you may make Two separate Attack Checks with Advantage. (Note: This cannot be used with weapons that have the Reload property).

synergy_feats.name: Masterful Riposte
synergy_feats.effect: Trigger: An enemy misses you with a melee attack. Effect: You react with a lightning-fast counter-attack. Make a melee Attack Check against them with Advantage. On a Hit, deal Weapon Damage plus an additional 1d10.

synergy_feats.name: Dance of Death
synergy_feats.effect: You become a whirlwind of death. You can Move up to your full Speed, ignoring counter-attacks and moving through enemy spaces. During this move, you can make up to 4 separate Attack Checks. Each attack must target a different enemy, and each is made with Advantage.

classes.name: Thief
classes.description: The master of the impossible. You bypass traps that aren't there, steal words before they are spoken, and vanish in plain sight.

synergy_feats.name: Master of Fortune
synergy_feats.effect: Your connection to luck deepens. 1. Your Maximum Luck increases by 2. 2. Seize the Moment...

synergy_feats.name: Master of Fortune
synergy_feats.effect: Your connection to luck deepens. 1. Your Maximum Luck increases by 2. 2. Seize the Moment: Once per combat, when you hit an enemy that is Flanked, Blinded, Stunned, or Prone, you immediately regain 1 Luck point.

synergy_feats.name: Ghost Strike
synergy_feats.effect: You merge with the shadows to assassinate a target. 1. Teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space with dim light or cover (you become Hidden). 2. Immediately make a melee Attack Check against an adjacent target with Advantage. On a Hit, deal Weapon Damage + 4d6 Precision Damage.

classes.name: Bounty Hunter
classes.description: The ultimate pursuer. You combine urban cunning with wilderness survival to track, corner, and capture specific targets. No one escapes you.

synergy_feats.name: Mark for Capture
synergy_feats.effect: Designate one creature you can see. For 1 minute, you have Advantage on checks to track them. Additionally, choose one debuff to apply to them: 1. Hobble: Target's Speed is halved. 2. Exploit: Target counts as Flanked by you (enabling Sneak Attack).

synergy_feats.name: Calculated Ambush
synergy_feats.effect: You exploit a momentary weakness. Make a single Attack Check with Advantage. On a Hit, deal Weapon Damage + 2d6. This attack is silent and does not break your Hidden condition.

synergy_feats.name: Inescapable Snare
synergy_feats.effect: Trigger: A creature moves. Effect: You instantly Teleport to an unoccupied space adjacent to them. The target is Grappled (Speed 0, Escape DC 15). You immediately make one Attack Check against them with Advantage.

classes.name: Spy
classes.description: A mastermind of secrets and social manipulation. You infiltrate perceptions, turn enemies into puppets, and strike when they are most vulnerable.

synergy_feats.name: Spy's Gambit
synergy_feats.effect: Target one enemy you can see. Make a Deception Check against their Will Save Value. On a Success, you vanish from their perception for 1 minute. To that specific target, you are Invisible. You gain Advantage on all attacks against them.

synergy_feats.name: Covert Operator
synergy_feats.effect: 1. Your Maximum Luck increases by 2. 2. Read the Room: After observing a social situation for 1 minute, you can ask the GM one of the following questions, which must be answered truthfully: 'Who is lying?', 'Who holds the real power?', or 'What is their hidden motive?'

synergy_feats.name: Master Manipulator
synergy_feats.effect: Target a humanoid who can hear you. Make a Deception Check against their Will Save Value. On a Success, the target is Charmed and must immediately obey a single, one-sentence command (e.g., 'Attack your ally', 'Drop the key').

classes.name: Alchemist
classes.description: A deadly chemist who blends stealth with volatile science. You deliver toxins with surgical precision and turn the battlefield into a toxic wasteland.

synergy_feats.name: Caustic Strike
synergy_feats.effect: Consume an Acid Flask or Alchemist's Fire. Make a Weapon Attack with Advantage. On a Hit, deal Weapon Damage plus the Reagent's full damage. Additionally, apply a debuff: Sunder Armor (Acid) or Burning (Fire).

synergy_feats.name: Catalyst
synergy_feats.effect: 1. Your Maximum Luck increases by 2. 2. Reactive Chemistry: Whenever you deal damage to a creature that is already Bleeding, Burning, or Poisoned, you deal an additional +1d6 Damage.

synergy_feats.name: Miasma
synergy_feats.effect: Consume a Smoke Bomb, Choking Gas, or Poison. You create a 15-foot-radius aura centered on yourself for 1 minute that moves with you. You are immune to it. Any other creature starting its turn in the aura suffers the full effect of the Reagent.

classes.name: Ranger
classes.description: The alpha of the pack. You are the trap and the arrow, fighting in perfect unison with a beast companion to bring down prey through coordination and overwhelming force.

synergy_feats.name: Coordinated Assault
synergy_feats.effect: You strike as one with your beast. Make a Weapon Attack against a target with Advantage. Simultaneously, your Beast Companion uses its Reaction to move up to its full speed and make an Attack against the same target.

synergy_feats.name: Primal Bond
synergy_feats.effect: You master your hunting style. You immediately gain the 'Primal Bond Selection' talent, allowing you to specialize in either your own aim or your beast's power.

synergy_feats.name: Apex Predator's Ambush
synergy_feats.effect: Requirement: You must be Hidden or it must be the first round of combat. Make a single Ranged Attack. This attack is an Automatic Critical Hit. It deals an additional +2d10 Damage. If the target survives, they are Grappled (Pinned to terrain) unless their Reflex Save beats your Attack Roll.

classes.name: Pathfinder
classes.description: The tactical mind of the hunt. You read the land like a map and coordinate your allies to strike with perfect timing, ensuring no terrain is too hostile and no enemy can hide.

synergy_feats.name: Pathfinder's Quarry
synergy_feats.effect: Designate a target within sight. For 1 minute, you and your allies have Advantage to track them. You personally have Advantage on Attacks against them. Additionally, the first time *each* ally hits this target, they deal an extra +1d6 Damage.

synergy_feats.name: Master Guide
synergy_feats.effect: 1. Your Maximum Luck increases by 2. 2. Guided Path: You and all allies within 30 feet have Advantage on checks to resist the Exhausted condition and non-magical Environmental Hazards (e.g., extreme heat, slippery ice, falling rocks).

synergy_feats.name: Coordinated Ambush
synergy_feats.effect: Target one enemy. A number of allies equal to your CHA Modifier can immediately use their Reaction to move up to 15 feet without provoking counter-attacks. After moving, all participating allies gain Advantage on their next Attack against the target.

classes.name: Scavenger
classes.description: A master of improvisation. You see weapons in the mud and medicine in the moss. You build tools on the fly to solve any problem, turning trash into treasure in the heat of battle.

synergy_feats.name: Improvised Crafting
synergy_feats.effect: You instantly forage or assemble a tool from the environment. Choose one Reagent from the Herbalism or Tinker list with a Craft DC of 13 or lower (e.g., Snare Trap, Healing Poultice). You create it instantly without spending Raw Materials. The item is unstable and decays into useless junk after 1 minute.

synergy_feats.name: Master Scavenger
synergy_feats.effect: 1. Your Maximum Luck increases by 2. 2. Keen Eye: You have Advantage on all Scrutiny and Investigate checks made to find hidden items, traps, secret doors, or valuable scrap.

synergy_feats.name: Scavenger's Upgrade
synergy_feats.effect: You jury-rig a powerful upgrade onto an ally's gear using a reagent. This buff lasts until the next Rest. Choose One: 1. Offensive: Weapon deals +1d10 Damage (Type matches the Reagent used). 2. Defensive: Armor Score increases by +2.

classes.name: Bard
classes.description: A virtuoso of morale. Your voice turns routs into victories. You inspire greatness, ensuring your allies fight harder, faster, and longer than they thought possible.

synergy_feats.name: Stirring Oration
synergy_feats.effect: You bolster your allies with a surge of confidence. Choose a number of allies within 30 feet equal to your CHA Modifier. They immediately gain 1d6 Temporary Hit Points and have Advantage on their very next d20 Check (Attack, Defense, or Skill).

synergy_feats.name: Master Orator
synergy_feats.effect: 1. Your Maximum Luck increases by 2. 2. Unwavering Voice: You project a 10-foot aura. You and all allies within this aura have Advantage on checks to resist the Frightened or Charmed conditions.

synergy_feats.name: Legendary Command
synergy_feats.effect: You issue a command that cannot be ignored. Choose a number of allies within 30 feet equal to your CHA Modifier. Each chosen ally can immediately use their Reaction to take ONE COMPLETE ACTION (e.g., Attack, Cast a Spell, Dash, or Use an Item).

classes.name: Merchant
classes.description: A master of logistics and investment. You make your allies stronger by equipping them with the best gear and maximizing the potency of every potion and bomb used in your presence.

synergy_feats.name: Patron's Gift
synergy_feats.effect: You apply a restorative or buffing Reagent (e.g., Healing Salve, Adrenaline Shot) to a willing ally. The Reagent's numerical effects are Maximized (e.g., healing 8 HP instead of 2d4). Additionally, the ally is so inspired by the aid that they gain Advantage on their very next d20 Check.

synergy_feats.name: Resourceful Leader
synergy_feats.effect: 1. Your Maximum Luck increases by 2. 2. Expert Application: You project a 10-foot aura. Whenever an ally within this aura uses a Reagent, it is empowered by your instruction. Restorative items heal additional HP equal to your CHA Modifier. Damaging items deal additional Damage equal to your INT Modifier.

synergy_feats.name: Flashy Investment
synergy_feats.effect: You use a damaging or utility Reagent with spectacular flair. The Reagent's damage or duration effects are Maximized. The display is so impressive that all allies within 30 feet gain 1d8 Temporary Hit Points and Advantage on their next d20 Check.

classes.name: Artisan
classes.description: The visionary inventor. You don't just follow recipes; you rewrite them. Your creations are more potent, more stable, and more devastating than anything bought in a shop.

synergy_feats.name: Alchemical Overdrive
synergy_feats.effect: You use a single Reagent with perfect, deadly precision. 1. If the item deals damage or heals, you maximize all the dice rolls. 2. If the item requires the target to make a Saving Throw, they have Disadvantage on the roll.

synergy_feats.name: Field Alchemy
synergy_feats.effect: You mix two substances in the heat of the moment. Choose two Reagents you are holding. You consume both to create a combined effect in a single Action (e.g., throwing Acid and Glue together to burn and bind a target simultaneously).

synergy_feats.name: Magnum Opus
synergy_feats.effect: You pour your genius into a single item usage. All numerical effects of the Reagent are Doubled. This includes damage dice (e.g., 4d6 instead of 2d6), area of effect radius (e.g., 20ft instead of 10ft), and duration.

classes.name: Wizard
classes.description: The architect of the arcane. You do not guess; you calculate. You master the laws of magic to shape spells with perfect efficiency and devastating area effects.

synergy_feats.name: Metamagic Adept
synergy_feats.effect: You have unlocked the secrets of spell modification. 1. The first time you apply one or more Spell Modifications (e.g., Empower, Widen) to a spell during combat, the DC increase for those modifications is reduced to 0. 2. You immediately learn one extra 'Arcane Specialization' talent.

synergy_feats.name: Fireball
synergy_feats.effect: You hurl a bead of fire to a point within 60 feet, where it erupts into a 15-foot-radius explosion. Make a Casting Check to determine the Effect DC. All creatures in the area take 4d6 Fire Damage unless their Dodge (Defense Check) equals or exceeds your Effect DC (Half Damage on success).

synergy_feats.name: Arcane Supremacy
synergy_feats.effect: You unleash a signature spell of ultimate power. Choose One: 1. Disintegrate: Single Target. 6d10 Force Damage (Ignores Armor Score). 2. Chain Lightning: Primary target takes 4d8 Lightning; arcs to two secondary targets for 3d8 Lightning. 3. Mass Hold: Up to 3 creatures are Stunned for 1 minute (Will Save ends).

classes.name: Void-Caller
classes.description: A scholar of the abyss. You treat the void as a formula to be solved, weaving spells that bind enemies with gravity, entropy, and forbidden geometry.

synergy_feats.name: Abyssal Tether
synergy_feats.effect: Target one creature within 30 feet. Make a Casting Check against their Will Save Value. On a Success, they are Tethered to the void for 1 minute. While Tethered, their Speed is Halved, and they are Weakened (all damage they deal is halved).

synergy_feats.name: Void Shift
synergy_feats.effect: You teleport yourself to an unoccupied space within 30 feet. Additionally, choose one effect: 1. Abyssal Arrival: You gain 1d10 Temporary Hit Points. 2. Displacement: You attempt to swap places with a creature at your destination. The creature is teleported to your starting space unless its Will Save beats your Casting Check.

synergy_feats.name: Grasp of the Void
synergy_feats.effect: You create a 15-foot-radius singularity at a point within 60 feet for 1 minute. Initial: All creatures in the area take 3d10 Necrotic Damage (Fortitude Save for half). Zone: The area is Difficult Terrain. Any creature starting its turn in the sphere is Grappled and Weakened unless its Reflex Save beats your Casting DC.

classes.name: Oracle
classes.description: A scholar of divine law and prophecy. You read the future in the flow of magic, revealing hidden truths and manipulating fate to favor your allies.

synergy_feats.name: Divine Scrutiny
synergy_feats.effect: You peer into a creature's essence. Target one enemy within 30 feet. Make a Casting Check against their Will Save. Success: 1. The GM must reveal vital tactical info (Current HP, Armor Score, or Resistances). 2. The target is Marked for 1 minute. All attacks made against it by you or your allies have Advantage.

synergy_feats.name: Beacon of Truth
synergy_feats.effect: You emit a 30-foot-radius aura of clarifying light for 1 minute. 1. Allies in the aura are cured of Charmed/Frightened. 2. Hidden or Invisible enemies in the aura are revealed. 3. You gain Advantage on all Scrutiny Checks.

synergy_feats.name: Channel Prophecy
synergy_feats.effect: You force a specific future to occur. Choose One: 1. Doom: Target is Weakened and has Disadvantage on Defense (1 min). 2. Sanctuary: Wards you and allies; the first time each drops to 0 HP, they drop to 1 HP instead. 3. Triumph: Target ally's next successful hit is an Automatic Critical.

classes.name: Elementalist
classes.description: A master of nature's raw fury. You channel the storm, the volcano, and the avalanche, blending arcane precision with primal chaos.

synergy_feats.name: Elemental Bolt
synergy_feats.effect: Make a Ranged Spell Attack (60ft). On Hit: Deal 2d8 Damage. Choose an element for a secondary effect: 1. Fire: Target burns. 2. Ice: Target Speed halved. 3. Lightning: Target cannot use Reactions. 4. Stone: Target knocked Prone (Fortitude Save negates).

synergy_feats.name: Elemental Aegis
synergy_feats.effect: You gain +1 Armor Score for 1 minute. Additionally, choose a form: 1. Fire: Melee attackers take 1d6 Fire dmg. 2. Wind: +2 Bonus to Dodge Checks. 3. Stone: Armor Score bonus increases to +2. 4. Frost: Melee attackers are Slowed.

synergy_feats.name: Cataclysm
synergy_feats.effect: You create a 15-foot-radius storm at a point within 60 feet for 1 minute. Initial: Creatures take 3d10 Elemental Damage (Dodge for half). Zone: Difficult Terrain. Fury: Once per turn (Free Action), you can strike one creature in the zone for 2d10 Lightning Damage.

classes.name: Warlock
classes.description: A gambler who plays with the forces of the abyss. You wield raw, self-destructive magic, cursing foes and summoning horrors at the cost of your own sanity.

synergy_feats.name: Curse of the Void
synergy_feats.effect: You inflict a withering hex on a creature within 30 feet. Make a Casting Check against their Will Save. On a Success, the target is Cursed for 1 minute. While Cursed, they are Weakened (dealing half damage) and take 1d6 Necrotic Damage at the start of each of their turns.

synergy_feats.name: Summon Horror
synergy_feats.effect: You tear a hole in reality to summon a shadowy beast for 1 hour. It acts on your turn (you use your Move to command it). Stats: HP equals your Level x 3, Armor Score 2, Attack deals 1d10 Necrotic. If destroyed, you cannot summon it again until you finish a Long Rest.

synergy_feats.name: Forbidden Power
synergy_feats.effect: You channel raw chaos. Make a Ranged Spell Attack (60ft). On a Hit: Target takes 10d10 Necrotic Damage (Ignores Armor). On a Miss: You take 2d10 Necrotic Damage yourself. REGARDLESS of the outcome, you immediately trigger a Magic Mishap.

classes.name: Heretic
classes.description: A priest of forbidden truths. You view life and death as a transaction. You siphon vitality from your enemies to heal your allies, or sacrifice your own blood to fuel miracles.

synergy_feats.name: Word of Power
synergy_feats.effect: You speak a word that alters life force. Choose One: 1. Word of Healing: A willing creature within 30 feet regains 2d8 + Casting Mod HP. 2. Word of Pain: Target enemy within 30 feet. Make Casting Check vs Will Save. Success: Deal 2d8 Necrotic Damage (Ignores Armor) and gain Temp HP equal to damage dealt.

synergy_feats.name: Dark Benediction
synergy_feats.effect: You invoke a powerful sermon. Choose One: 1. Servitude: Target enemy within 30 feet must pass a Will Save or be Charmed for 1 minute. 2. Power: Target ally within 30 feet deals an additional +1d6 Necrotic Damage on all attacks for 1 minute.

synergy_feats.name: Sacrificial Word
synergy_feats.effect: You trade life for life. Choose One: 1. Give Life: You take 2d10 Damage (cannot be reduced). A creature dead for less than 1 minute returns to life with 1 HP. 2. Take Life: Make a Melee Spell Attack. Deal 5d10 Necrotic Damage. You or an ally heal for the full amount dealt.

classes.name: Witch
classes.description: A vessel for the dark nature of the world. You do not ask nature for aid; you bargain with its feral, predatory spirit. Your magic creates cursed zones of thorns and shadows, and you can shift into a terrifying beast form.

synergy_feats.name: Binding Hex
synergy_feats.effect: You whisper a pact to the hungry earth to bind a foe. Target one creature within 30 feet. Make a Casting Check against their Will Save. On a Success, they are Cursed for 1 minute. While Cursed, their Speed is Halved (grasping shadows), and they are Weakened (dealing only half damage on all attacks).

synergy_feats.name: Shadow-Form
synergy_feats.effect: You transform into a shadowy beast for 1 minute. 1. Your Unarmed Strike deals 1d8 Necrotic Damage (Finesse). 2. You gain Advantage on Stealth checks and can Hide even while observed. 3. When you hit a creature with your Shadow Strike, they are Weakened until the start of your next turn.

synergy_feats.name: Curse of the Hungry Wild
synergy_feats.effect: You create a 15-foot-radius zone of writhing, thorny shadows at a point within 60 feet for 1 minute. Initial: Creatures in the area take 3d8 Necrotic Damage (Fortitude Save for half). Zone: The area is Difficult Terrain. Any creature starting its turn in the zone must make a Will Save or be Frightened of you for 1 round.

classes.name: Prophet
classes.description: The purest conduit of divine power. You are not merely a servant of a god; you are a living miracle. You bring absolute healing to the faithful and blinding judgment to the wicked.

synergy_feats.name: Divine Authority
synergy_feats.effect: You channel raw power to give or take life. Choose One: 1. Heal: A willing creature you touch regains 3d6 + WIS Modifier HP. 2. Smite: Make a Melee Spell Attack. On a Hit, deal 3d6 Radiant Damage. If the target is Undead or a Fiend, this attack is an Automatic Critical Hit.

synergy_feats.name: Hallowed Ground
synergy_feats.effect: You consecrate the battlefield. You create a 15-foot-radius aura centered on you for 1 minute. 1. Allies who start their turn in the aura regain 1d4 HP. 2. Allies in the aura gain a +1 Bonus to Defense and Advantage on saves against Spells.

synergy_feats.name: Miracle
synergy_feats.effect: Passive: You are Immune to Charmed, Frightened, and Poisoned. Active: Once per week, perform a true miracle: 1. Mass Heal (Full HP/Cure to all allies within 60ft). 2. Resurrection (Revive creature dead <24 hours). 3. Banishment (Destroy/Banish powerful Unholy entity on failed Will Save).

classes.name: Shaman
classes.description: A spiritual guide who speaks for the land and the ancestors. You summon totems to ward your allies and call down storms to punish those who disrespect the spirits.

synergy_feats.name: Spirit's Touch
synergy_feats.effect: You channel spiritual energy. Choose One: 1. Ancestral Aid: A willing creature you touch is filled with vigor and regains 2d8 + WIS Modifier HP. 2. Primal Rebuke: Make a Melee Spell Attack against an adjacent enemy. On a Hit, deal 2d8 Lightning Damage and push the target 10 feet away.

synergy_feats.name: Spirit Totem
synergy_feats.effect: You summon a physical Totem (HP 10, Armor Score 1) in an unoccupied space within 30 feet. It projects a 15-foot aura for 1 minute. Choose One: 1. Healing: Allies starting their turn in the aura regain 1d4 HP. 2. Binding: The area is Difficult Terrain for enemies, grasping at their legs.

synergy_feats.name: Spirit Storm
synergy_feats.effect: You conjure a massive 15-foot-radius cylinder of swirling spirits within 60 feet. Choose One: 1. Renewal: Allies in the area regain 4d8 HP and are cured of Bleeding/Poisoned. 2. Wrath: Enemies in the area take 4d10 Lightning Damage and are knocked Prone (Dodge/Reflex Save for half).

classes.name: Druid
classes.description: The raw, untamed power of nature. You are not a servant of the wild; you are the storm, the earthquake, and the beast. You shift forms to tear enemies apart or reshape the battlefield with grasping roots.

synergy_feats.name: Primal Form
synergy_feats.effect: You transform into a beast for 1 minute. (No spellcasting while shifted). Choose One: 1. Great Wolf: Speed 40ft, Unarmed Strike 1d6 (Finesse), +1 Bonus to Dodge Checks. 2. Great Bear: Unarmed Strike 1d10, +2 Armor Score, Advantage on Athletics Checks.

synergy_feats.name: Wrath of Nature
synergy_feats.effect: You slam the ground, erupting nature's fury in a 15-foot radius within 60 feet. 1. Crushing Earth: Creatures take 3d8 Damage (Fortitude Save for half). 2. Grasping Vines: Creatures are Grappled (Speed 0) unless their Reflex Save beats your Casting Check.

synergy_feats.name: Master of the Wild
synergy_feats.effect: You are an avatar of the wild. 1. True Shapeshifter: Your Primal Form now lasts for 1 Hour. 2. Child of the Wild: You are immune to non-magical Grapples (webs/vines) and ignore natural Difficult Terrain. 3. Beast Tongue: You can speak with animals at will.

classes.name: Spellblade
classes.description: The master of the arcane arts of war. You weave magic into your sword swings, using tactical precision to deliver elemental destruction at point-blank range.

synergy_feats.name: Arcane Strike
synergy_feats.effect: You imbue your weapon with raw magic. Make a Melee Attack with Advantage. On a Hit, you deal normal Weapon Damage plus an additional 1d6 Force Damage. Additionally, you may push the target 5 feet away from you.

synergy_feats.name: Spell-Weave
synergy_feats.effect: You cast a spell through your blade. Choose an Arcanist spell you know (e.g., Firebolt, Burning Hands). Make a Melee Attack. On a Hit: Deal normal Weapon Damage, and the Spell successfully hits the target automatically (or they have Disadvantage on the Save).

synergy_feats.name: Force Blade Execution
synergy_feats.effect: You manifest a blade of pure energy. Make a Melee Attack. This attack is treated as an Automatic Critical Hit (Natural 20). It deals Critical Weapon Damage plus 4d10 Force Damage (Ignoring Armor). If this kills the target, you regain 1d4 Mana Points.

classes.name: Hexblade
classes.description: A warrior bound by a dark pact to a sentient weapon or shadow entity. You fuel your strikes with your own blood, cursing foes and draining their life to sustain your own.

synergy_feats.name: Crimson Rite
synergy_feats.effect: You slice your own flesh to awaken your blade. You immediately take 1d4 Damage (this cannot be reduced). Make a Melee Attack with Advantage. On a Hit, deal Weapon Damage plus 1d10 Necrotic Damage.

synergy_feats.name: Siphon Vitality
synergy_feats.effect: You impale a foe to drain their essence. Make a Melee Attack. On a Hit: Deal Weapon Damage plus 2d6 Necrotic Damage. You Heal Hit Points equal to the Necrotic damage dealt. Additionally, the target is Weakened (dealing half damage) until the start of your next turn.

synergy_feats.name: Doombringer
synergy_feats.effect: You gamble your soul on a single strike. Make a Melee Attack against an enemy. On a Hit: It is an Automatic Critical. Deal Crit Weapon Damage + 4d10 Necrotic. Target is Frightened. On a Miss: You take 2d10 Necrotic Damage (Ignores Armor). If this damage reduces you to 0 HP, you die instantly.

classes.name: Paladin
classes.description: A holy warrior and battlefield leader. You do not hide in temples; you bring your faith to the front lines, protecting allies with a shield of devotion and smiting the wicked with righteous fire.

synergy_feats.name: Divine Smite
synergy_feats.effect: Trigger: Immediately after you hit a creature with a melee attack. Effect: The attack deals an additional 1d8 Radiant Damage. If the target is an Undead or Fiend, the bonus increases to 2d8 Radiant Damage, and this damage ignores the target's Armor Score.

synergy_feats.name: Champion's Mercy
synergy_feats.effect: You charge through the fray to save a life. Move up to your Full Speed without provoking counter-attacks, ending adjacent to an ally. Touch that ally to restore 3d6 + WIS Mod HP. If the ally was at 0 HP, they can immediately use their Reaction to stand up or make an attack.

synergy_feats.name: Exalted Judgment
synergy_feats.effect: You strike with the weight of a god. Make a Melee Attack. On a Hit: Deal Weapon Damage plus 4d8 Radiant Damage. Burst: You and all allies within 30 feet regain Hit Points equal to the Radiant Damage dealt by this attack.

classes.name: Storm Vanguard
classes.description: A warrior who commands the shock and awe of the storm. You wear plate armor that conducts electricity, using wind to reposition allies and thunder to shatter enemy lines.

synergy_feats.name: Thunderous Rebuke
synergy_feats.effect: You strike with the weight of a storm front. Make a Melee Attack with Advantage. On a Hit: Deal Weapon Damage plus 1d6 Thunder Damage. The target is pushed 10 feet away from you. If they hit a wall or another creature, they are knocked Prone.

synergy_feats.name: Cloak of the Zephyr
synergy_feats.effect: You wrap a creature in protective winds. Touch yourself or an ally. For 1 minute, Ranged Attacks against them have Disadvantage, and their Speed increases by 10 feet. When you cast this, the target can immediately use their Reaction to move up to their new Speed without provoking counter-attacks.

synergy_feats.name: Ride the Lightning
synergy_feats.effect: You transform into a bolt of electricity. Teleport to an unoccupied space adjacent to an enemy within 60 feet. Arrival: All creatures within 10 feet of your destination (except you) take 2d8 Thunder Damage. Strike: Immediately make a Melee Attack against the target. On a Hit: Deal Weapon Damage + 4d8 Lightning Damage.

classes.name: Spell-Smasher
classes.description: A brute who channels magic through pure physical stress. You carve unstable runes into your weapons and release them on impact, shattering magical defenses and exploding enemies.

synergy_feats.name: Rune-Crush
synergy_feats.effect: You detonate a rune on impact. Make a Melee Attack with Advantage. On a Hit, deal Weapon Damage plus 1d6 Force Damage. Regardless of whether you hit or miss the primary target, the rune releases a shockwave: all other creatures adjacent to the target take 1d4 Force Damage automatically.

synergy_feats.name: Spell-Breaker
synergy_feats.effect: You strike to disrupt magic. Make a Melee Attack. On a Hit: Deal Weapon Damage plus 2d6 Force Damage. Any active magical buffs on the target (e.g., Shield, Haste) end immediately. If your Attack Roll exceeds the target's Will Save Value, they are also Silenced until the start of your next turn.

synergy_feats.name: Arcane Annihilation
synergy_feats.effect: You overload your body with mana and leap into the fray. Jump up to 30 feet to a point you can see (No OA). Upon landing, you slam the ground. All creatures within 15 feet (except you) must make a Reflex Save against your Athletics Check. Fail: Take 4d10 Force Damage, knocked Prone, and Dazed. Pass: Half damage.

classes.name: Bloodrager
classes.description: A warrior whose fury is fueled by a dark entity or curse. You let the monster inside take the wheel, shedding your own blood to deal necrotic damage and terrifying your foes.

synergy_feats.name: Sanguine Cleave
synergy_feats.effect: You coat your weapon in cursed blood. Make a Melee Attack with Advantage. On a Hit, deal Weapon Damage plus 1d6 Necrotic Damage. Optional: You may choose to take 1d4 Damage (cannot be reduced) to increase the bonus Necrotic Damage to 2d6.

synergy_feats.name: Blood-Boil Nova
synergy_feats.effect: You unleash a psychic scream. Make an Intimidation Check. All enemies within 15 feet must compare their Will Save Value to your result. Fail: They take 3d6 Psychic Damage and are Frightened for 1 round. If this kills a creature, you immediately regain 1 Stamina.

synergy_feats.name: Avatar of Slaughter
synergy_feats.effect: You assume a demonic form for 1 minute. 1. Size: You grow Large (Reach +5ft). 2. Life Drinker: Regain 1d10 HP once per turn when you hit. 3. Unstoppable: Immune to Charmed/Frightened/Stunned. Warning: When this ends, you gain the Exhausted condition.

classes.name: Inquisitor
classes.description: A furious holy warrior who hunts heretics and monsters. You channel divine wrath through heavy weapons, crushing bodies and silencing wicked tongues with decisive force.

synergy_feats.name: Hammer of Heresy
synergy_feats.effect: You strike with the weight of judgment. Make a Melee Attack with Advantage. On a Hit: Deal Weapon Damage plus 1d6 Radiant Damage. If your Attack Roll exceeds the target's Reflex Save Value, they are knocked Prone and their Speed is reduced to 0 until the end of their next turn.

synergy_feats.name: Silence the Unbeliever
synergy_feats.effect: You deliver a blow to shatter concentration. Make a Melee Attack. On a Hit: Deal Weapon Damage plus 2d8 Thunder Damage. The target must make a Fortitude Save vs. your Attack Roll. Fail: They are Stunned for 1 round and Silenced for 1 minute.

synergy_feats.name: Rite of Annihilation
synergy_feats.effect: You erase an enemy from existence. Make a Melee Attack. This is an Automatic Critical Hit (Natural 20). It deals Critical Weapon Damage plus 4d8 Radiant Damage (Ignoring Armor). If this reduces the target to 0 HP, their body turns to ash, and you regain 1d10 HP and 1d4 Stamina.

classes.name: Shapeshifter
classes.description: A warrior who treats their body as a weapon to be forged in combat. You use visceral magic to grow claws, bone plates, and titanic muscle, becoming a monster to fight monsters.

synergy_feats.name: Mutating Strike
synergy_feats.effect: You force a violent evolution upon a limb. Make a Melee Attack with Advantage. On a Hit, deal 1d10 Damage. For the next 1 minute, your Unarmed Strike becomes a Heavy Weapon dealing 1d8 Damage. You also gain 1d6 Temporary Hit Points.

synergy_feats.name: Form of the Monstrosity
synergy_feats.effect: You transform for 1 minute, gaining +2 Armor Score. Choose a Form: 1. Siege Beast: If you move 20ft before attacking, deal +2d6 Damage and knock target Prone (No Save). 2. Spine-Thrasher: Once per turn (Free Action), deal 1d4 Piercing Damage to all adjacent enemies.

synergy_feats.name: Titanic Growth
synergy_feats.effect: You grow to Huge size for 1 minute. 1. Your Reach increases by 10 feet. 2. Your melee attacks deal an additional +1d12 Damage. 3. Stomp: You can move through spaces occupied by smaller creatures. They must make a Reflex Save or take 2d8 Bludgeoning Damage and be Flattened (Prone).

classes.name: Glyph-Warden
classes.description: A sentinel who inscribes magic onto steel. You are a battery of defensive power, turning your shield into a trap and your armor into a repulsion field.

synergy_feats.name: Glyph of Retribution
synergy_feats.effect: Trigger: When you use the Block Action. Effect: You gain Advantage on the Block Check. Regardless of success, the attacker takes 1d6 Force Damage. If the Block was successful (you took no damage), the attacker is also pushed 10 feet away.

synergy_feats.name: Circle of Warding
synergy_feats.effect: You inscribe a 15-foot-radius circle on the ground (1 min). 1. Allies inside gain +1 Armor Score. 2. The area is Difficult Terrain for enemies. 3. Enemies ending their turn inside take 1d4 Force Damage.

synergy_feats.name: Living Monolith
synergy_feats.effect: You become an avatar of force for 1 minute. 1. You gain Resistance to ALL Damage. 2. You are Immune to Prone/Forced Movement. 3. Reflective Carapace: When a creature hits you with a melee attack, they take 1d8 Force Damage (Ignores Armor).

classes.name: Grave-Warden
classes.description: A protector of the threshold between life and death. You use necrotic magic to drain the strength of your foes, binding their souls to yours and punishing them for every blow they strike.

synergy_feats.name: Vampiric Block
synergy_feats.effect: Trigger: You use the Block Action. Effect: You gain Advantage on the Block Check. If the Block is successful (you take no damage), the attacker takes 1d6 Necrotic Damage, and you immediately Regain HP equal to the damage dealt.

synergy_feats.name: Tether of the Damned
synergy_feats.effect: Target one enemy within 30 feet. Make a Check (CON/CHA) vs. their Will Save. Success: Target is Tethered (1 min). 1. They have Disadvantage on attacks not targeting you. 2. Sympathetic Pain: Whenever YOU take damage, the Tethered target takes 1d6 Necrotic Damage (Ignores Armor).

synergy_feats.name: Aura of the Crypt
synergy_feats.effect: You emit a 15-foot entropy aura (1 min). 1. Area is Difficult Terrain. 2. Enemies starting turn in aura take 2d6 Necrotic (You heal 1 HP per enemy damaged). 3. Undying: You are Immune to Unconscious. You remain standing and acting at 0 HP, though you must still make Death Saves.

classes.name: Cleric
classes.description: A protector who brings the temple to the trenches. You carry the heaviest shields and channel the strongest prayers, refusing to let your allies fall as long as you draw breath.

synergy_feats.name: Blessed Block
synergy_feats.effect: Trigger: You use the Block Action. Effect: You gain Advantage on the Block Check. Regardless of the block's outcome, holy light erupts from your shield. Choose yourself or an ally within 10 feet to immediately regain 1d8 Hit Points. If you roll a Natural 20 on the Block check, the healing is Maximized (8 HP).

synergy_feats.name: Sanctified Ground
synergy_feats.effect: You consecrate the earth beneath you. You create a 15-foot-radius aura centered on yourself for 1 minute. 1. Holy Ward: You and all allies in the circle gain +2 Armor Score. 2. Renewal: Allies starting their turn in the circle regain 1d4 Hit Points. 3. Rebuke: Any Undead or Fiend entering the circle takes 1d6 Radiant Damage.

synergy_feats.name: Martyr's Intercession
synergy_feats.effect: Trigger: An ally within 30 feet is reduced to 0 HP or killed. Effect: You instantly Teleport adjacent to them. The ally is restored to Half their Maximum HP and cured of all negative conditions. Cost: You take damage equal to the amount of HP restored. This damage cannot be reduced or prevented.

classes.name: Earth-Warden
classes.description: A sentinel sworn to the mountain itself. You are the immovable object made manifest, using roots to bind foes and raising walls of stone to shield the weak.

synergy_feats.name: Entangling Block
synergy_feats.effect: Trigger: You use the Block Action. Effect: You gain Advantage on the Block Check. Regardless of the outcome, vines and stone erupt from your shield to catch the attacker. They must make a Reflex Save against your Block Check Result. On a failure, they are Grappled (Speed 0) until they use an Action to escape.

synergy_feats.name: Tectonic Rampart
synergy_feats.effect: You slam the earth. Choose One: 1. Wall: Create a physical wall of stone (20ft long, 5ft high) adjacent to you. It provides Cover. 2. Eruption: Create the wall under an enemy's feet. They must make a Reflex Save vs. your Guardian Check or take 2d6 Bludgeoning Damage and be knocked Prone.

synergy_feats.name: Avatar of the Mountain
synergy_feats.effect: You transform into a colossus of stone for 1 minute. 1. Size: You become Large (Reach +5ft). 2. Skin: You gain Resistance to Non-Magical Physical Damage. 3. Aura: The ground within 15 feet of you is Difficult Terrain. 4. Siege: Your melee attacks deal an additional +1d10 Damage (+Double vs Structures).

classes.name: Arcane Archer
classes.description: A master of ballistics and bombardment. You do not see a bow as a simple weapon, but as a delivery system for destruction, firing arrows that burn, freeze, or tear holes in reality.

synergy_feats.name: Elemental Shot
synergy_feats.effect: You infuse your ammunition with energy. Make a Ranged Attack with Advantage. On a Hit, deal normal Weapon Damage plus a secondary effect: 1. Fire: +1d6 Fire Damage and the target Burns. 2. Ice: +1d6 Cold Damage and target Speed is Halved. 3. Force: The arrow seeks the target, ignoring Cover, and deals +1d6 Force Damage.

synergy_feats.name: Phase Arrow
synergy_feats.effect: You fire a projectile that exists between dimensions. Make a Ranged Attack that Ignores Cover and Armor Score. On a Hit: Deal Weapon Damage plus 2d6 Force Damage. Immediately after the shot, you can Teleport to an unoccupied space within 10 feet of the target.

synergy_feats.name: Singularity Volley
synergy_feats.effect: You fire an arrow that collapses reality. Make a Ranged Attack. Whether you hit or miss, a 15-foot-radius gravity well erupts. 1. Pull: All creatures in the radius must make a Reflex Save vs your Attack Roll or be pulled 10ft to center and knocked Prone. 2. Crush: All creatures in the radius take 4d10 Force Damage. 3. Impact: If you hit a creature directly, they also take Weapon Damage.

classes.name: Arcane Archer
classes.description: A master of ballistics and bombardment. You do not see a bow as a simple weapon, but as a delivery system for destruction, firing arrows that burn, freeze, or tear holes in reality.

synergy_feats.name: Elemental Shot
synergy_feats.effect: You infuse your ammunition with energy. Make a Ranged Attack with Advantage. On a Hit, deal normal Weapon Damage plus a secondary effect: 1. Fire: +1d6 Fire Damage and the target Burns. 2. Ice: +1d6 Cold Damage and target Speed is Halved. 3. Force: The arrow seeks the target, ignoring Cover, and deals +1d6 Force Damage.

synergy_feats.name: Phase Arrow
synergy_feats.effect: You fire a projectile that exists between dimensions. Make a Ranged Attack that Ignores Cover and Armor Score. On a Hit: Deal Weapon Damage plus 2d6 Force Damage. Immediately after the shot, you can Teleport to an unoccupied space within 10 feet of the target.

synergy_feats.name: Singularity Volley
synergy_feats.effect: You fire an arrow that collapses reality. Make a Ranged Attack. Whether you hit or miss, a 15-foot-radius gravity well erupts. 1. Pull: All creatures in the radius must make a Reflex Save vs your Attack Roll or be pulled 10ft to center and knocked Prone. 2. Crush: All creatures in the radius take 4d10 Force Damage. 3. Impact: If you hit a creature directly, they also take Weapon Damage.

classes.name: Nightblade
classes.description: A killer who weaves shadows into a weapon. You do not merely hide in the dark; you travel through it. You teleport across the battlefield to strike exposed vitals with a blade wreathed in curses.

synergy_feats.name: Shadow-Step Strike
synergy_feats.effect: You slip through a crack in reality. 1. Teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space adjacent to an enemy. 2. Immediately make a Melee Attack against that enemy with Advantage. 3. On a Hit, deal Weapon Damage plus 1d6 Necrotic Damage.

synergy_feats.name: Cloak of Nightmares
synergy_feats.effect: You strike with a blade of maddening whispers. Make a Melee Attack. On a Hit: Deal Weapon Damage plus 2d6 Psychic Damage, and the target must make a Will Save vs. your Attack Roll or be Blinded and Frightened for 1 minute. Effect: Regardless of whether you hit or miss, you become Invisible until the start of your next turn or until you attack.

synergy_feats.name: Void Walker's Execution
synergy_feats.effect: You become a living shadow. 1. Move up to your Full Speed. You are Incorporeal (can move through creatures/objects) and ignore counter-attacks. 2. At the end of the move, make one Melee Attack. This is an Automatic Critical Hit (Natural 20). It deals Critical Weapon Damage plus 4d10 Necrotic Damage and ignores all Armor Score.

classes.name: Monk
classes.description: A divine agent of physical perfection. You channel your god's power through your fists, striking with a flurry of blows that disrupt life force and shatter bone.

synergy_feats.name: Radiant Flurry
synergy_feats.effect: You unleash a barrage of holy strikes. Make Two separate Unarmed Attacks. Each deals Weapon Damage plus 1d4 Radiant Damage. If at least one attack hits, you immediately regain 1d6 Hit Points as the kinetic energy cycles back into your spirit.

synergy_feats.name: Resonant Palm
synergy_feats.effect: You strike a nerve cluster with divine will. Make a Melee Attack. On a Hit: Deal Weapon Damage plus 2d6 Thunder Damage. The target must make a Fortitude Save vs your Attack Roll. Fail: They are Stunned for 1 round. Effect: You can Disengage as a Free Action.

synergy_feats.name: Transcendence
synergy_feats.effect: You become a beam of pure light. 1. Move up to Double Speed (No OA, pass through enemies). 2. Make one Melee Attack against EVERY enemy you pass (Max 5). Each hit deals 1d10 Radiant Damage. 3. Purge: At the end of the move, you are cured of all negative conditions and regain 10 HP.

classes.name: Spirit-Walker
classes.description: A warrior who treads the line between the material world and the spirit realm. You phase through walls, run on air, and deliver strikes that bypass steel to cut directly at the soul.

synergy_feats.name: Wind-Step Strike
synergy_feats.effect: You wrap yourself in a sheath of spiraling wind. You can Move up to your Full Speed without provoking counter-attacks. At the end of the move, make a single Melee Attack Check with Advantage. On a Hit, deal Weapon Damage plus 1d6 Thunder Damage, and the target is pushed 5 feet away from you.

synergy_feats.name: Aspect of the Phase-Cat
synergy_feats.effect: You become a ghost of the battlefield. 1. You become Incorporeal until the end of your turn (passing through objects; take 1d10 damage if you end inside one). 2. Move up to your Full Speed. 3. Make a single Melee Attack that Ignores Armor Score. On a Hit, deal Weapon Damage plus 2d6 Force Damage.

synergy_feats.name: Avatar of the Storm
synergy_feats.effect: You surrender your form to become a living tempest for 1 minute. 1. You gain a Fly Speed equal to your walking speed. 2. You have Advantage on all Dodge Defense Checks. 3. Once per turn, when you hit a creature with a melee attack, you deal an additional +1d10 Lightning Damage.

classes.name: Ninja
classes.description: A disciplined operative of the shadows. You do not fight fair; you fight to win. You blend martial arts with dirty tricks, striking from the dark to silence enemies before they can scream.

synergy_feats.name: Silent Takedown
synergy_feats.effect: You execute a flawless assassination technique. Make a Melee Attack with Advantage. On a Hit: Deal Weapon Damage + 2d6 Precision Damage. The target is Silenced (cannot speak/cast) until the start of your next turn. If you were Hidden, you remain Hidden after the attack.

synergy_feats.name: Shadow Substitution
synergy_feats.effect: Trigger: You are hit by an attack. Effect: You take 0 Damage as you replace yourself with a log or decoy. You immediately Teleport 15 feet to an unoccupied space and gain the Hidden condition.

synergy_feats.name: Blade of the Void
synergy_feats.effect: You channel your ki into a single, perfect strike. Make a Melee Attack. This is an Automatic Critical Hit (Natural 20). It deals Critical Weapon Damage + 4d8 Precision Damage (Ignoring Armor and Resistance). If the target survives, they are Stunned for 1 round.

classes.name: Monster Hunter
classes.description: A professional slayer of beasts and titans. You prepare the battlefield with traps, track your quarry with supernatural precision, and strike the weak points of creatures ten times your size.

synergy_feats.name: Hobbling Strike
synergy_feats.effect: You strike a vital tendon. Make a Weapon Attack with Advantage. On a Hit: Deal Weapon Damage plus 1d6 Precision Damage. Compare your Attack Roll to the target's Fortitude Save Value. If you equal or exceed it, the target's Speed is reduced to 0 until the end of their next turn.

synergy_feats.name: Flash-Trap
synergy_feats.effect: You deploy a trap and force an enemy into it in one motion. Consume 1 Trap Reagent (e.g., Snare, Caltrops). Make a Melee Attack (Kick/Shove). On a Hit: Deal 1d8 Bludgeoning Damage. The target is pushed into the trap and immediately suffers its full effects with Disadvantage on any save to resist it.

synergy_feats.name: Leviathan Bane
synergy_feats.effect: You strike the fatal flaw in a titan. Make an Attack Check. If the target is Large or larger, this is an Automatic Critical Hit (Natural 20). Deal Critical Weapon Damage plus 4d10 Precision Damage. If the target survives, it is Weakened and Bleeding for 1 minute.

classes.name: Captain
classes.description: An officer who leads from the front. You demand discipline and courage, coordinating your squad's attacks and turning them into an unbreakable wall.

synergy_feats.name: Direct the Assault
synergy_feats.effect: You create an opening. Make a Weapon Attack with Advantage. On a Hit: Deal Normal Damage. Additionally, one ally who can see you can immediately use their Reaction to make an Attack against the same target with Advantage.

synergy_feats.name: Hold the Line
synergy_feats.effect: You bellow a command to steel your squad. Create a 30-foot aura centered on yourself for 1 minute. 1. Allies in the aura are Immune to Frightened. 2. Allies in the aura gain +1 Armor Score. 3. Upon activation, all allies gain 1d8 Temporary Hit Points.

synergy_feats.name: Total War
synergy_feats.effect: You direct a synchronized offensive. Choose a number of allies equal to your INT Modifier (min 2). Each chosen ally immediately takes ONE COMPLETE ACTION (Attack, Spell, Dash, etc.) as a Free Action. This does not cost their Reaction.

classes.name: Siege-Master
classes.description: A warrior-scholar of destruction. You apply alchemy and engineering to the front line, breaching gates, fortifying positions, and turning corridors into kill-zones.

synergy_feats.name: Breaching Strike
synergy_feats.effect: Consume a damaging Reagent (e.g., Bomb, Acid). Make a Melee Attack with Advantage. On a Hit: Deal Weapon Dmg + Reagent Dmg. The target's Armor Score is permanently reduced by 1. Against Objects/Structures, this deals Double Damage.

synergy_feats.name: Instant Fortification
synergy_feats.effect: Consume 1 Scrap/Reagent. Make a Craft Check to set the DC. Create a 10ft line of Cover adjacent to you. Allies behind it gain +1 Armor Score. Enemies crossing it take 2d4 Piercing Damage and must make a Reflex Save (vs your Craft Check) or stop moving.

synergy_feats.name: Cluster-Bombardment
synergy_feats.effect: Consume 1 AoE Reagent. Choose a point within 60ft. 1. The Reagent's Radius is Doubled. 2. Make a Ranged Attack Check to set the Blast DC. 3. All creatures in area take Weapon Dmg + Maximized Reagent Dmg (Reflex vs DC for half). 4. All non-magical cover/objects in area are destroyed.

classes.name: Thug
classes.description: A brutal enforcer who fights dirty. You don't care about honor; you care about winning. You blind, cripple, and mug your opponents, exploiting every moment of weakness.

synergy_feats.name: Dirty Haymaker
synergy_feats.effect: You feint a heavy attack to deliver a cheap shot. Make a Melee Attack with Advantage. On a Hit: Deal Weapon Damage + 1d8 Bludgeoning. Additionally, the target must make a Fortitude Save vs. your Attack Roll. Fail: Choose one: 1. Gouge: Target is Blinded for 1 round. 2. Kneecap: Target is Prone and Speed is reduced to 0.

synergy_feats.name: Violent Shakedown
synergy_feats.effect: You slam an enemy to rattle their gear. Make a Melee Attack. On a Hit: Deal Weapon Damage + 2d6 Precision Damage. 1. The target is forced to drop one held item (Weapon/Shield/Item). 2. The target is Dazed (can only take Action or Move) until the start of your next turn.

synergy_feats.name: Kingpin's Cruelty
synergy_feats.effect: Requirement: Target must have a negative condition (e.g., Prone, Blinded, Grappled). Make a Melee Attack. This is an Automatic Critical Hit (Natural 20). Deal Critical Weapon Damage + 4d10 Precision Damage. If this reduces the target to 0 HP, all other enemies within 30ft must save vs. Intimidation or be Frightened.

classes.name: Pit-Fighter
classes.description: A warrior forged in the mud and blood of the arena. You fight like a cornered beast, using vicious strikes and traps to maim your prey and ensure they cannot escape.

synergy_feats.name: Maiming Strike
synergy_feats.effect: You strike to hobble. Make a Melee Attack with Advantage. On a Hit: Deal Weapon Damage + 1d6 Precision. Target must make a Fortitude Save vs your Attack Roll. Fail: Target is Bleeding and Speed is Halved (1 min). If you are Grappling the target, they Auto-Fail the save.

synergy_feats.name: Iron-Jaw Slam
synergy_feats.effect: Consume 1 Trap Reagent (e.g., Snare, Caltrops). Make a Melee Attack. On a Hit: Deal Weapon Dmg + 1d8. The target is slammed into the trap, suffering its full effects immediately. They have Disadvantage on any save to resist the trap.

synergy_feats.name: The Killing Floor
synergy_feats.effect: You unleash a primal roar. Make an Intimidation Check. All enemies within 30ft compare Will Save vs your result. Fail: Frightened (1 min) and cannot Dash/Disengage. Then, make one Melee Attack against an adjacent foe. If they are Frightened, it is an Automatic Critical Hit.

classes.name: Warlord
classes.description: A ruler of the battlefield who demands victory at any cost. You use terrifying aggression to break enemy morale and drive your allies into a blood-fueled frenzy.

synergy_feats.name: Savage Directive
synergy_feats.effect: You deliver a crushing blow to mark a target. Make a Melee Attack with Advantage. On a Hit: Deal Normal Weapon Damage. The target is Marked until the start of your next turn. The first time an ally hits this Marked target, they deal an additional +1d8 Damage.

synergy_feats.name: Aura of Dominance
synergy_feats.effect: You project an aura of terrifying authority. Make an Intimidation Check. All enemies within 30 feet must compare their Will Save Value to your result. Fail: They are Frightened of you for 1 minute. Passive: Allies within 30 feet have Advantage on Attacks against Frightened creatures.

synergy_feats.name: War Cry of the Titan
synergy_feats.effect: You unleash a primal scream. 1. Enemies within 60 feet must make a Will Save vs. your Intimidation Check. Fail: Stunned for 1 round. 2. Allies within 60 feet enter a Frenzy for 1 minute: They gain Resistance to Physical Damage and deal +1d6 Damage on melee attacks.

classes.name: Demolitionist
classes.description: A warrior who loves the sound of shattering stone. You tape explosives to hammers, blow open doors, and solve problems by applying maximum force to the weakest point.

synergy_feats.name: Explosive Sledge
synergy_feats.effect: Consume a damaging Reagent (e.g., Bomb, Acid). Make a Melee Attack with Advantage. On a Hit: Deal Weapon Dmg + Reagent Dmg. Shockwave: All creatures adjacent to the target (except you) must make a Reflex Save vs your Attack Roll or be knocked Prone.

synergy_feats.name: Ground Zero
synergy_feats.effect: Consume 1 Explosive Reagent. You detonate it on yourself. 1. You take Half Damage. 2. All enemies in the radius take Double Reagent Damage and are pushed 10 feet away.

synergy_feats.name: The Wrecking Ball
synergy_feats.effect: You charge with unstoppable momentum. Move up to full Speed (can move through/destroy walls and objects). Make one Melee Attack. This is an Automatic Critical Hit (Natural 20). Deal Crit Weapon Dmg + 4d10 Bludgeoning. Structures take Triple Damage. Creatures are Stunned.

classes.name: Shadow-Guard
classes.description: A deceptive defender who protects by baiting attacks. You lure enemies into overextending, blocking their strikes with hidden shields and answering with a blade in the ribs.

synergy_feats.name: Deceptive Block
synergy_feats.effect: Trigger: You use the Block Action against a melee attack. Effect: You gain Advantage on the Block Check. If the Block is successful (you take no damage), the attacker is caught off guard. You immediately deal 1d6 Precision Damage to them, and they are Blinded until the start of their next turn.

synergy_feats.name: Shadow Interception
synergy_feats.effect: Trigger: An ally within 15 feet is targeted by an attack. Effect: You instantly move to an unoccupied space adjacent to that ally (No OA). The attack targets you instead. You make your Defense Check with Advantage. If the attack misses, both you and the ally gain Advantage on your next Attack against that enemy.

synergy_feats.name: Assassin's Aegis
synergy_feats.effect: You enter a stance of perfect, lethal stillness for 1 round. 1. You gain a +5 Bonus to ALL Defense Checks. 2. Reaction: If a creature misses you with a melee attack (or you Block it), you can make a single Melee Attack against them. This is an Automatic Critical Hit (Natural 20) dealing Crit Damage + 4d6 Precision Damage.

classes.name: Beast-Guard
classes.description: A sentinel of the wild. You bond with a massive beasta bear, tortoise, or boarfighting as a single defensive unit to shield the pack and crush intruders.

synergy_feats.name: Bond of the Ward-Beast
synergy_feats.effect: Passive: You gain a Ward-Beast (HP: Level x 5, Armor Score: 2, Dmg: 1d6). Reaction (2 STA): When an ally within 15 feet is hit by an attack, your Beast immediately moves adjacent to them and takes the damage instead.

synergy_feats.name: Phalanx of Tooth and Claw
synergy_feats.effect: You and your beast lock into a defensive formation for 1 minute. 1. Shared Defense: Both you and the beast gain +2 Armor Score. 2. Sanctuary: Any ally adjacent to either you or the beast cannot be Flanked and has Advantage on Defense Checks.

synergy_feats.name: Spirit of the Ancient Guardian
synergy_feats.effect: You merge life forces for 1 minute. 1. Shared Health: You and the beast share a single HP pool (Damage to either subtracts from this total). 2. Regen: At the start of your turn, the pool regains 1d10 HP. 3. Vengeance: If an enemy damages the beast, your next attack against them deals +2d8 Damage.

classes.name: Sentinel
classes.description: A paragon of defense who leads by example. You stand at the front, shouting warnings and orders that turn your party into an unbreakable fortress.

synergy_feats.name: Watcher's Warning
synergy_feats.effect: Trigger: An ally within 30 feet is targeted by an attack. Effect: The ally gains Advantage on their Defense Check. If they succeed (dodge/block), they can immediately use their Reaction to move 10 feet without provoking counter-attacks.

synergy_feats.name: Fortress of Will
synergy_feats.effect: You create a 15-foot aura of resolve for 1 minute. 1. Iron Mind: Allies in the aura are Immune to Frightened and Charmed. 2. Stability: Allies cannot be Knocked Prone or moved against their will. 3. Shielding: Allies gain +1 Armor Score while in the aura.

synergy_feats.name: Indomitable Formation
synergy_feats.effect: You link the fates of your squad for 1 minute. Choose allies (qty = CHA Mod). 1. Damage Share: Whenever a bonded ally takes damage, you can redistribute that damage among any bonded members. 2. Retaliation: If a bonded ally is hit, any other bonded ally can use their Reaction to make an Attack against the attacker.

classes.name: Armorer
classes.description: A warrior-engineer who believes steel is the only god worth praying to. You use alchemy and mechanics to reinforce armor, creating a walking tank that punishes anyone who strikes it.

synergy_feats.name: Ablative Reinforcement
synergy_feats.effect: Trigger: You or an adjacent ally take physical damage. Cost: Consume 1 Reagent (Scrap/Any). Effect: Reduce the damage by 1d10 + INT Modifier. If the damage is reduced to 0, the attacker's weapon jars against the plating, and they are Dazed until their next turn.

synergy_feats.name: Volatile Shielding
synergy_feats.effect: Coat armor/shield in reactive paste. Consume 1 Damaging Reagent (Acid/Fire). For 1 minute, whenever a creature hits the wearer with a melee attack (or the wearer Blocks), the attacker takes 1d6 + INT Modifier damage of the Reagent's type.

synergy_feats.name: Living Fortress
synergy_feats.effect: You activate lockdown pistons. Enter Fortress Mode (1 min). 1. Your Speed becomes 0 (Immovable). 2. You gain Resistance to ALL Damage (Half Damage). 3. You provide Total Cover to adjacent allies. 4. Your Melee Reach increases by 5 feet.

classes.name: Assassin
classes.description: A ghost who sells death. You rely on mobility to get behind enemy lines and ruthless precision to end the fight before the enemy knows it has begun.

synergy_feats.name: Stalking Strike
synergy_feats.effect: You move with unnatural silence. Move up to your Full Speed without provoking counter-attacks. At any point during this move, make a Melee Attack with Advantage. If the target is Flanked, Surprised, or you were Hidden, deal Weapon Damage plus 2d6 Precision Damage.

synergy_feats.name: Crimson Vanish
synergy_feats.effect: Trigger: You reduce an enemy to 0 HP or land a Critical Hit. Effect: You immediately become Invisible until the start of your next turn. You can move 15 feet. Your next attack made from this Invisibility scores a Critical Hit on a roll of 19 or 20.

synergy_feats.name: Death's Shadow
synergy_feats.effect: You become a blur of lethal intent. 1. Move up to Double Speed (ignore difficult terrain/enemies). 2. At the end of the move, make one Melee Attack. This is an Automatic Critical Hit (Natural 20). It deals Critical Weapon Damage plus 5d6 Precision Damage and ignores all Armor Score.

classes.name: Trapper
classes.description: A hunter who treats the battlefield like a chessboard. You lead enemies on a chase that ends in a snap of steel, using movement to deploy hazards and punishing those who get caught.

synergy_feats.name: Vaulting Deployment
synergy_feats.effect: Consume 1 Trap Reagent (e.g., Snare, Caltrops, Grease). You Move up to your Full Speed without provoking counter-attacks. At any point during the move, you deploy the trap. If placed in an occupied space, the target triggers it immediately with Disadvantage on the Save. If unoccupied, it arms instantly.

synergy_feats.name: Cull the Snared
synergy_feats.effect: Target an enemy suffering from impaired movement (Grappled, Restrained, Prone, Slowed) or standing in Difficult Terrain. Make an Attack with Advantage. On a Hit: Deal Weapon Damage plus 2d8 Precision Damage. The target's Speed is reduced to 0 until the end of their next turn.

synergy_feats.name: The Killing Field
synergy_feats.effect: Consume 1 Trap Reagent. Move up to Double Speed (ignore difficult terrain/enemies). Every space you exit becomes filled with a copy of that Trap. At the end of the move, make one Ranged Attack against a target in the field. This is an Automatic Critical Hit (Natural 20).

classes.name: Scout
classes.description: The vanguard of the party. You move faster than the main force to identify threats, directing the flow of battle and creating openings for your allies to exploit.

synergy_feats.name: Vanguard's Mark
synergy_feats.effect: You dash forward to tag a target. Move up to your Full Speed without provoking counter-attacks. At the end of the move, make an Attack with Advantage. On a Hit: Deal normal damage and Mark the target. The next ally to attack this target has Advantage and deals an additional +1d6 Damage.

synergy_feats.name: Signal the Advance
synergy_feats.effect: Trigger: An enemy ends their turn. Effect: You signal a tactical shift. Choose a number of allies equal to your CHA Modifier. They can immediately use their Reaction to Move up to their Full Speed without provoking counter-attacks.

synergy_feats.name: The Kill Box
synergy_feats.effect: You pin the enemy down. 1. Move up to Full Speed. 2. Make one Attack. This is an Automatic Critical Hit (Natural 20). 3. Command: Until the start of your next turn, all allies have Advantage on attacks against that target, and their hits deal an additional +1d8 Precision Damage.

classes.name: Trickster
classes.description: A warrior who treats combat as a lethal joke. You are never where the enemy looks, dashing through the melee to plant explosives and toxins before vanishing in a puff of smoke.

synergy_feats.name: Payload Delivery
synergy_feats.effect: Consume a Thrown/Coating Reagent. Move up to Full Speed (No OA). At any point, make an Attack with Advantage. On a Hit: Deal Weapon Dmg + Full Reagent Effect. On a Miss: The Reagent still detonates in the target's space (Target suffers effect but no weapon damage).

synergy_feats.name: Smoke-Step
synergy_feats.effect: Trigger: You are hit or fail a Defense Check. Cost: Consume 1 Obscuring Reagent (e.g., Smoke, Flash). Effect: The incoming damage is Halved. You teleport 15 feet to an unoccupied space. The space you left is filled with the Reagent's cloud effect.

synergy_feats.name: Chaos Volley
synergy_feats.effect: Consume 1 Reagent. You miraculously multiply its effect. Choose up to 3 targets within range. Make an Attack against each. On Hit: Deal Weapon Dmg + Maximized Reagent Effect. On Miss: Reagent detonates on target (Standard Effect).

classes.name: Arcane Trickster
classes.description: The ultimate magical thief. You use illusions to distract, mage hands to pilfer, and silent spells to assassinate. You don't fight fair; you fight with every magical and mundane advantage you can steal.

synergy_feats.name: Arcane Ambush
synergy_feats.effect: You weave a sneak attack into a spell. Cast an Arcanist Spell that requires an Attack Roll. You gain Advantage on the Casting Check. This casting is Subtle (no sound/gestures). If the target is Flanked, Surprised, or you are Hidden, deal an additional +1d6 Precision Damage.

synergy_feats.name: Spell Thief
synergy_feats.effect: You attempt to steal a magical effect. Target a creature within 30 feet that has a magical buff (e.g., Shield, Haste). Make a Stealth & Thievery Check against their Will Save Value. Success: The effect ends on them and is transferred to you for 1 minute (or its remaining duration).

synergy_feats.name: Phantom Army
synergy_feats.effect: You create 3 Illusory Duplicates in your space for 1 minute. Defense: When you are targeted, roll a d6. On a 1-4, a clone takes the hit and is destroyed (you take 0 damage). Offense: Whenever you attack or cast, one remaining clone makes an automatic attack against the same target for 1d8 Force Damage.

classes.name: Scholar
classes.description: An adventurer who wields knowledge as a weapon. You blend arcane theory with survival skills to analyze enemies, bypass their defenses, and create perfect tactical kill-zones.

synergy_feats.name: Applied Anatomy
synergy_feats.effect: You recall a weakness. Target one creature. 1. You learn its Current HP, Resistances, and Immunities. 2. Immediately cast an Arcanist Attack Spell against it. This spell Ignores Resistance. If the target has Immunity, it is treated as Resistance (Half Damage) instead.

synergy_feats.name: Geometric Warding
synergy_feats.effect: You define a 20-foot square zone on the ground for 1 minute. 1. Sanctuary: Allies inside have Cover (+2 Defense). 2. Trap: The area is Difficult Terrain for enemies. 3. Hazard: Choose an element (Fire/Cold/Lightning). Enemies entering or starting their turn in the zone take 2d6 Elemental Damage.

synergy_feats.name: Universal Theory
synergy_feats.effect: You cancel the variables of an enemy's existence. Target one creature within 60 feet. Make a Casting Check against their Will Save. Success: Deal 10d6 Force Damage. This damage Ignores Armor Score, Resistance, Immunity, and Spells (like Shield). The target is also Stunned for 1 round.

classes.name: Sage
classes.description: A magical advisor and master tactician. You do not hoard knowledge; you apply it. You use magic to elevate your allies, swapping their positions, infusing their weapons, and granting them flight.

synergy_feats.name: Arcane Mandate
synergy_feats.effect: You weave a spell of acceleration. Choose one ally within 30 feet. That ally can immediately use their Reaction to make a single Weapon Attack. This attack is made with Advantage and deals an additional +1d6 Force Damage.

synergy_feats.name: Tactical Transposition
synergy_feats.effect: You rearrange the battlefield. Choose two creatures within 60 feet (one must be you or an ally). Willing targets fail automatically; unwilling enemies must make a Will Save vs. your Casting Check. If successful, the targets instantly swap positions via teleportation. An enemy swapped this way is Dazed until their next turn.

synergy_feats.name: Circle of Ascension
synergy_feats.effect: You act as a conduit for raw power. You create a 30-foot aura centered on yourself for 1 minute. You and all allies in the aura gain: 1. A Fly Speed of 30 feet (Hover). 2. Resistance to damage from Spells. 3. An additional +1d8 Force Damage on all weapon attacks.

classes.name: Artificer
classes.description: A magical engineer who binds arcane forces into clockwork and steel. You solve problems by building the solution, infusing volatile reagents with mana to create seeking projectiles and automated spells.

synergy_feats.name: Arcane Infusion
synergy_feats.effect: You infuse a damaging Reagent (e.g., Acid, Bomb) with mana. Make a Casting Check to throw it. 1. The attack Ignores Cover. 2. The damage type changes to Force Damage. 3. The damage is increased by +1d6.

synergy_feats.name: Spell-Storing Trigger
synergy_feats.effect: You cast an Arcanist spell (Cost 1 MP) into a weapon or object. It remains stored for 1 hour. Trigger: The next time the weapon hits or the object is used, the spell activates immediately on the target (Auto-Hit). You do not need to pay the spell's MP cost at the time of triggering.

synergy_feats.name: The Automaton Engine
synergy_feats.effect: You integrate with a masterwork construct suit for 1 minute. 1. You are Immune to Charmed, Frightened, and Confused. 2. You gain Resistance to Spell Damage. 3. Overclock: Once per turn, you can use a Reagent as a Free Action.

classes.name: Cultist
classes.description: A thief of secrets and souls. You infiltrate high society or secure vaults not for gold, but to plant curses and recover forbidden artifacts. You strike from the shadows, weakening your prey with dark magic before delivering a mercy kill.

synergy_feats.name: Whispered Hex
synergy_feats.effect: You weave a spell with zero trace. Cast an Occultist Spell that targets a single creature. This casting is Subtle (no sound/gestures). If you are Hidden, you remain Hidden after casting. The target has Disadvantage on any Saving Throw made to resist the spell.

synergy_feats.name: Traitor's Luck
synergy_feats.effect: Trigger: An enemy within 30 feet succeeds on an Attack Check or Saving Throw. Effect: You twist fate, forcing them to Re-roll the check and use the new result. If the re-roll results in a Failure, the enemy takes 2d6 Psychic Damage from the backlash.

synergy_feats.name: Ritual of the Black Knife
synergy_feats.effect: You perform a sacred assassination. Make a Melee Attack. If the target is Flanked, Surprised, or suffering from a Negative Condition (e.g., Hexed, Blinded), this attack becomes an Automatic Critical Hit (Natural 20). It deals Critical Weapon Damage plus 5d10 Necrotic Damage. If this kills the target, you regain 1d4 Mana Points.

classes.name: Grave-Robber
classes.description: A grim survivalist of the crypts. You do not fear the curse or the trap; you weaponize them. You combine dirty fighting with forbidden magic to bind enemies and harvest power from the dead.

synergy_feats.name: Dead Man's Snare
synergy_feats.effect: You infuse a physical trap with a necrotic hex. Consume 1 Trap Reagent (e.g., Snare, Caltrops). Deploy it as per the item's rules. When triggered, the target suffers the physical effect AND must make a Will Save against your Casting Check. On a failure, they are Cursed for 1 minute. While Cursed, they cannot regain HP and take 1d6 Necrotic Damage every time they move or attempt to escape the trap.

synergy_feats.name: Grave-Sight
synergy_feats.effect: You attune your senses to death for 10 minutes. 1. Spirit Vision: You can see Invisible and Ethereal creatures/objects. 2. Predator's Eye: You have Advantage on Attack Checks against Undead and any creature below 50% HP. 3. Loot Sense: You automatically sense the direction of the most valuable object within 60 feet.

synergy_feats.name: Exhume the Horde
synergy_feats.effect: You call forth vengeful spirits in a 30-foot radius. The area becomes Difficult Terrain. Enemies in the area must make a Reflex Save or be Restrained by spectral hands. At the start of each of your turns, every Restrained enemy takes 3d6 Necrotic Damage. You regain 1 MP for every enemy damaged this way (max 3 MP/turn).

classes.name: Cult Leader
classes.description: A charismatic zealot who has seen the truth. You gather followers through spiritual fervor, driving your allies into a blood-rage while withering the resolve of non-believers.

synergy_feats.name: Fanatical Command
synergy_feats.effect: You drive an ally to violence. Choose one ally within 30 feet. They immediately use their Reaction to make a Weapon Attack. This attack deals an additional +1d6 Psychic Damage. After the attack, the ally gains 1d6 Temporary Hit Points.

synergy_feats.name: Aura of the Idol
synergy_feats.effect: You project a 30-foot aura of terrifying authority for 1 minute. 1. Terrify: Enemies starting their turn in the aura must compare their Will Save to your Intimidation Check. Fail: They are Frightened of you until their next turn. 2. Embolden: Allies in the aura have Advantage on attacks against Frightened creatures.

synergy_feats.name: Rite of the Black Goat
synergy_feats.effect: You link your party to the void. For 1 minute, you and all allies within 60 feet are 'Blessed'. 1. Pain Tolerance: Blessed creatures have Resistance to Physical Damage. 2. Vampiric Strike: Once per turn, a Blessed creature deals +1d10 Necrotic Damage on a hit and heals for that amount.

classes.name: Necromancer
classes.description: An artisan of the macabre. You do not pray to the dead; you build them. You combine galvanic fluids, preservation jars, and necrotic magic to construct undead minions that are faster, stronger, and more volatile.

synergy_feats.name: Volatile Reanimation
synergy_feats.effect: You infuse a corpse with a volatile reagent. Consume 1 Damaging Reagent (e.g., Bomb, Acid). Target a corpse within 30 feet. It animates as a Thrall (5 HP, Speed 30). It acts immediately on your turn. When it is reduced to 0 HP, it explodes, dealing the Reagent's Damage to all adjacent creatures.

synergy_feats.name: Surgical Augmentation
synergy_feats.effect: You reinforce an undead minion with steel and chemistry. Target one Undead you control. For 1 hour: 1. It gains +2 Armor Score. 2. Its Speed increases by 10 feet and it has Advantage on Attacks. 3. The first time it drops to 0 HP, it explodes for 2d6 Necrotic damage but reassembles at 1 HP.

synergy_feats.name: The Flesh-Colossus
synergy_feats.effect: You stitch together a titan. Consume 1 Reagent. Summon a Large Flesh-Colossus in an unoccupied space within 30 feet for 1 minute. Stats: 30 HP, AS 1. It makes Two Slam Attacks (2d10 Dmg each). Chemical Blood: Whenever it takes damage, all adjacent creatures take 1d6 Damage (Type matches the consumed Reagent).

classes.name: Pilgrim
classes.description: A traveler on a secret holy mission. You use stealth to survive in hostile lands, delivering miracles with a whisper and vanishing before the wicked can strike back.

synergy_feats.name: Silent Prayer
synergy_feats.effect: You invoke a miracle without sound or gesture. Cast a Priest Spell. If you are Hidden, you remain Hidden after casting. Additionally, you gain Advantage on the Casting Check, and if the spell heals or deals damage, add +1d6 to the roll.

synergy_feats.name: Grace Under Fire
synergy_feats.effect: Trigger: You take damage. Effect: You take Half Damage. You immediately regain HP equal to the damage you took. Then, you can move up to 15 feet without provoking counter-attacks.

synergy_feats.name: Saint's Fortune
synergy_feats.effect: You walk with destiny. Enter a state of holy luck for 1 minute. 1. Immune to Grappled, Restrained, Stunned. 2. All Attack/Casting Checks have Advantage. 3. Divine Luck: Once per round, if you fail a Defense Check, you can treat it as a Success instead.

classes.name: Exorcist
classes.description: A divine hunter of the unnatural. You know exactly which prayer hurts a poltergeist and which root binds a demon. You use sanctified traps to cage spirits and banish them from the material world.

synergy_feats.name: Sanctified Snare
