synergy_feats.effect: You infuse a trap with holy water and scripture. Consume 1 Trap Reagent (e.g., Snare, Caltrops). Deploy it. When triggered, the target suffers the standard physical effect AND takes 1d8 Radiant Damage. If the target is an Undead or Fiend, they have Disadvantage on any check to resist or escape the trap.

synergy_feats.name: Rite of the Silver Cage
synergy_feats.effect: You bind a supernatural entity. Target one creature within 30 feet. Make a Scrutiny Check against their Will Save. Success: The target is Bound for 1 minute. 1. Their Speed becomes 0. 2. They cannot Teleport or Shapeshift. 3. If Incorporeal, they are forced to materialize and lose their resistances.

synergy_feats.name: The Purgation Zone
synergy_feats.effect: You create a 30-foot cylinder of absolute purity for 1 minute. 1. Any Undead, Fiend, or Aberration inside takes 3d10 Radiant Damage at the start of their turn (No Save). 2. Allies inside have Resistance to Necrotic Damage and Immunity to Charm/Fear. 3. If an extra-planar creature hits 0 HP inside, it is instantly Banished.

classes.name: Bishop
classes.description: A pillar of the faith who commands respect from the battlefield. You issue edicts that shatter fear, heal the wounded, and inspire your flock to a holy crusade.

synergy_feats.name: Shepherd's Hand
synergy_feats.effect: You pull an ally from the brink. Choose one ally within 30 feet. 1. They regain 1d6 + WIS Mod HP. 2. They can immediately use their Reaction to Move up to their Full Speed without provoking counter-attacks.

synergy_feats.name: Edict of Absolution
synergy_feats.effect: Trigger: You or an ally within 30 feet fails a Save against a mental effect (Charm, Fear, Confusion). Effect: You speak a word of authority. The target treats the roll as a Success instead, ending the effect instantly. They gain Advantage on their next Attack Check.

synergy_feats.name: The Grand Crusade
synergy_feats.effect: You declare a holy war. For 1 minute, you and all allies within 60 feet gain: 1. +1d8 Radiant Damage on all weapon attacks. 2. Immunity to Frightened and Stunned. 3. Divine Fortune: A d20 roll of 19 counts as a Critical Hit.

classes.name: Scribe
classes.description: A warrior-scholar who carries the word of their god in ink and oil. You inscribe holy texts onto shields, brew sacred waters, and turn alchemy into a vessel for miracles.

synergy_feats.name: Sanctified Munitions
synergy_feats.effect: You transmute a volatile reagent into holy power. Consume 1 Damaging Reagent (e.g., Bomb, Acid). Throw it using your Priest Casting Check. On Impact: 1. It deals Radiant Damage instead of its normal type. 2. It releases a burst of positive energy; all allies in the blast radius regain 1d6 Hit Points.

synergy_feats.name: Scripture of Warding
synergy_feats.effect: You inscribe a protective prayer on an ally's armor. Consume 1 Reagent (Ink/Chalk). For 1 minute, the ally gains: 1. +1 Armor Score. 2. Resistance to Necrotic Damage. 3. Retribution: When hit by a melee attack, the attacker takes 1d6 Radiant Damage.

synergy_feats.name: Glyph of Judgment
synergy_feats.effect: You unleash a cataclysmic rune. Consume 1 Reagent. Create a 30-foot cylinder of light. 1. Enemies take 4d10 Radiant Damage and are Blinded (1 min). Reflex Save for half/no blind. 2. Allies regain 2d10 HP and are cured of all negative conditions.

classes.name: Shadow-Stalker
classes.description: A predator of the twilight. You understand that nature is not just sunlight and growth; it is silence, predation, and death. You do not just hide in the environment; you become it, striking with the sudden, violent finality of a viper.

synergy_feats.name: Mist-Walker's Strike
synergy_feats.effect: You exhale a cloud of obscuring mist. 1. You become Invisible until the end of your turn. 2. You can Move up to your Full Speed without provoking counter-attacks. 3. At the end of the move, make a Melee Attack (with Advantage due to Invisibility). On a Hit, deal Weapon Damage plus 1d6 Poison Damage.

synergy_feats.name: Form of the Viper
synergy_feats.effect: You transform into a predator of shadow (Snake, Panther, Spider) for 1 minute. 1. Natural Camouflage: You can Hide even while observed if near shadows. 2. Venomous Fangs: Your Unarmed Strike becomes a Finesse weapon (1d8 Damage). If you hit a target from Hiding, they must make a Fortitude Save vs. your Attack Roll or be Paralyzed (Stunned) until the start of your next turn.

synergy_feats.name: The Hunting Grounds
synergy_feats.effect: You unleash a primal curse, creating a 30-foot sphere of magical darkness and grasping vines for 1 minute. 1. Panic: Enemies in the zone are Blinded and treat it as Difficult Terrain. 2. Stalker's Sight: You see perfectly in the zone. 3. The Cull: Once per turn, you can Teleport to any space in the zone (Free Action). Your attacks against enemies inside deal +2d6 Precision Damage.

classes.name: Beast Heart
classes.description: A warrior bound to a spirit beast. You fight in perfect unison with your companion, sharing life force, casting spells through its eyes, and evolving its form to suit the battle.

synergy_feats.name: Bond of the Spirit Beast
synergy_feats.effect: Passive: You gain a Spirit Beast (HP: Level x 3, AS: 1, Dmg: 1d6). It is magical and can be resummoned for 2 MP during a rest. Action (1 MP + 1 Luck): Command your beast to attack. It strikes with Advantage. On a Hit, it deals Weapon Damage plus 1d6 Elemental Damage (Fire/Cold/Lightning) and applies a secondary effect (Burn/Slow/Shock).

synergy_feats.name: Evolutionary Surge
synergy_feats.effect: You flood your beast with power for 1 minute. 1. Growth: It becomes Large and can serve as a Mount. 2. Resilience: It gains 1d10 Temp HP. 3. Mutation (Choose One): Wings (Fly 40ft), Iron Hide (+2 AS), or Rending Claws (Damage becomes 2d6).

synergy_feats.name: Soul of the Apex
synergy_feats.effect: You merge consciousness with your beast for 1 minute. 1. Titanic: Beast becomes Huge (Reach +10ft). 2. Power: Beast attacks deal +2d8 Force Damage. 3. Conduit: You can cast Primalist spells originating from the beast's space. 4. Shared Life: You share a single HP pool; healing either heals the pool.

classes.name: Chieftain
classes.description: The spiritual and military head of a clan. You speak with the voice of the thunder, calling down storms to shield your people and imbue them with the strength of the wild.

synergy_feats.name: Storm-Caller's Command
synergy_feats.effect: You shout with the force of a gale. 1. Enemies in a 15-foot cone take 1d6 Thunder Damage and are pushed 5 feet away. 2. Allies in the cone gain +10 feet to their Speed until the end of their next turn.

synergy_feats.name: Totem of War
synergy_feats.effect: You summon a Totem (HP 10, AS 1) in an unoccupied space within 30 feet. It projects a 15-foot aura for 1 minute. 1. Primal Ward: Allies in the aura have Resistance to Cold, Fire, and Lightning Damage. 2. Savage Inspiration: Once per round, an ally in the aura adds your WIS Modifier to their melee damage.

synergy_feats.name: Ancestral Storm
synergy_feats.effect: You conjure a 30-foot-radius storm centered on yourself for 1 minute. 1. Fury: At the start of your turn, a lightning bolt strikes one enemy in the storm for 3d8 Lightning Damage. 2. Wisdom: Allies in the storm have Advantage on all Saves. 3. Guide: Allies ignore Difficult Terrain within the storm.

classes.name: Herbalist
classes.description: A master of the Green Science. You mix mana with moss and turn seeds into bombs. You support your allies with mutagenic potions and control the battlefield with rapid, weaponized overgrowth.

synergy_feats.name: Seed-Bombardment
synergy_feats.effect: You infuse a volatile reagent with surges of growth magic. Consume 1 Damaging or Utility Reagent (e.g., Acid Flask, Tanglefoot Bag). Throw it using your Casting Check. The Reagent's Radius is Doubled. The area becomes Difficult Terrain (thorny vines). Creatures in the area take 1d6 Poison Damage in addition to the Reagent's standard effect.

synergy_feats.name: Infusion of the Titan
synergy_feats.effect: You brew a potent mutagen on the fly. Consume 1 Restorative Reagent (e.g., Healing Salve, Stone-Skin). Touch a willing creature. They receive the Reagent's effect with all variable numbers Maximized. Additionally, they physically mutate for 1 minute: they gain +1 Armor Score (Barkskin) and have Advantage on all Strength Checks.

synergy_feats.name: The Genesis Bloom
synergy_feats.effect: You plant a seed containing absolute life force. Consume 1 Reagent. A Large magical flower erupts in an unoccupied space within 30 feet, lasting for 1 minute. It projects a 30-foot aura. 1. Allies starting their turn in the aura regain 1d10 HP and are cured of Poison. 2. Enemies starting their turn in the aura must make a Fortitude Save or take 3d8 Poison Damage and be Blinded.
